story:
KEEP OUT demo version 1.0.4 (Windows)has been released.

 

 

 

 

 

Many YouTubers have reviewed our demo and we can't thank them enough. Following playlist contains some of those reviews.

 

Il existe des développeurs indépendants partout dans le monde et c'est donc avec un certain plaisir que nous avons aujourd'hui déniché une production venue de Corée -Jeuxvideo.com

 

It’s shaping up very nicely and it’s a pretty tense experience – the world can be a surprisingly scary place when you’re only a few inches tall! -AlphaBetaGamer

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

KEEP OUT is a horror and mystery puzzle adventure game.

A whole story of Keep OUT is from Devota Hill in 2044, in which players are set to challenge themselves anew by using unconventional character portrayals become "Mr. M", the toy of a wise and benevolent monarch, and freshly woven plot twists to the secrets of Devota Hill and HumathScience.

You can see the detail of KEEP OUT stories translated into Japanese, French, Korean via Official Page.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Players explore Devota Hill by manipulating Mr. M in 3D, cross-scroll (side scroller) views.

You may have to fight, dodge, or sometimes get stuck against aggressive rats, drones flying around town, human beings who kill animated toys, and other aggressive toys that don't serve the benevolent lord Mr. M. Sometimes you have to use parts of the toy that were killed to survive.

WEAVERACTIVE team is planning KEEP OUT to be playable for about 4 hours when playing normally.

 

 

The animals at Devota Hill are vicious for some reason.

Dogs roam the town with their leash loose and rats guard the aisle swaying. They don’t let you stay moving. The players can run at high speed and avoid areas where animals cannot enter. Of course, there are ways to distract and pass quietly.

 

It is early to say, you are safe if you’ve avoided the wild animals!
There are drones navigating small gaps through the buildings of Devota Hill. The drone stuns the toy with a powerful laser, dragging it away from a terrifying human being, or even letting a giant human know the location of the toy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

An announcement surprised the world

In 2035, a remarkable presentation begins at a press conference held in the hall of Humath Science.INC  

" Benjamin Gunn: We've opened up a new era of RIoT, beyond the age of the traditional IoT. Artificial intelligence applied to our new RIoT technology is not the intelligence of "artificial" but the intelligence of the "real" that acts autonomously.  Through sufficient research of Humath laboratory...."

 

Since the release of HumathScience, forces opposed to having intelligence have sparked protests around the world against RIoT systems, and Humath Science has announced that the intelligence applied to the RIoT system is not equipped with any network devices, and that accidents that occur in the mismatch between humanity and RIoT's goals, as shown in sci-fi films, will never happen, nor will they harm humans or any other creatures.

Despite HumathScience's ongoing announcement that there are enough devices to respond to all possible problems and variables, the RIo system's counter-protest never stopped, and humath science agreed to gradually expand the range of things from small  toys under the control of HumathScience, with the consent of the villagers of Devota Hill near its laboratory.

 

Live moving toys

Humath Science's RIoT system has been successfully realized even protester are still doubts and worries about it. Intelligent toys were not violent at all as studied/planned by Humath science, especially because they were favorable to humans and had no uncontrol matters are existed over them, so the villagers happily adapted to the coexistence of living with moving toys.

The children were enthusiastic. They thought that their favorite toys are alive and moving!

The toys have become friends with pure children in the form of their own games, anime, and cartoon series.

 

Things that shouldn't have happened

World was seeing to the positive effects of RIoT technology, where all the inhabitants of the village were satisfied with no accidents. One day, explosion sounded came out from the outskirts of Devota Hill, armed men began take over the village. Their purpose is only one thing: the interruption of the RIoT system and the disposal of all objects with the RIoT system.

The terrorists relentlessly pressed HumathScience's research institute, and their actions were out of control, including taking the people of Devota Hill hostage. There was only one way to stop them, but Humath Science strongly responded that the idea of scrapping toys with the RIoT system is like murder.

As a result, devota Hill, a conflict between mercenaries and terrorists in private military enterprises under Humath Science, has become like a battlefield. Contrary to HumathScience's publication, villagers who were threatened with survival were forced to kill toys with RIoT systems to survive.

KEEP OUT tells the story of Mr. M, the monarch of toys that survived the mercy killing spree. What will happen next among Humath Science, villagers, terrorists, and toys?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

(Animation such as "Fairy Cake," "Moonlit" and "Escape from Features!" in the description only exists in KEEP OUT’s worldview.)

 

Mr.M

Mr. M. is a benevolent monarch character from the famous fairy tale series <Fairy Cake>.

Mr.M  is a sixth-generation figure that appeared in Fairy Cake: Beyond the Edge, one of the many-designed figures for generations.
 

"You should bless but not curse those who persecute you."
Episode 7 <Fairy Cake : Beyond the edge>
 


 

 

Nocturne

Nocturne is a mysterious toy. He is not even attacked by drones for some reason. He only appeared briefly in the animated series "Who are you?" in the 23rd episode of Moonlit, but he gained huge popularity because of his strong character.

 

 

CPT. James

CPT. James is a brave and vicious pirate captain in <Escape from pirates!>! This is the first figure in <Escape from pirates!> series. As a vicious pirate captain, he doesn't like a benevolent monarch Mr. M.
 

“What sort of king hides in his castle while his men die for him?”
Episode 12 <Escape from pirates!>

 

 

 

 

Wolf

Wolf, who follows Mr.M well, is a dog character from <Fairy Cake: Sunday Morning>.
A stupid but Wolf pretends to not be stupid at Mr.M's side.

A limited-edition figure released at a famous fast food restaurant as a Christmas event.

 

 

SOMEE

SOMEE is a desert fox character who lives in snowfields and became the president of children around the world on an online video streaming site. He is currently a member of Humath Science's marketing department and is active as a representative character in humath science public relations.

 

In addition to the toys introduced, a variety of toys are featured throughout Devota Hill. Most of them were killed by humans, but each surviving toy plays an important role, and it can help Mr.M or be hostile.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

There are religious facilities that can be a relief for toys that are always threatened with survival.

There is a religious facility prepared for toys always threatened their lives.
The lights from the cellophane stained glass give Devota Hill's toys peace of mind.
Made from remodeling boxes of famous couriers, it also has paper chairs made by toys.

 

 

Exercise is a really important factor for toys who spend most of their time indoors.
Under the guidance of the trainer "Wrestler", who is famous for toys, the toys work hard against external threats.

 

The bathtub of an abandoned house has been transformed into a deep sea. Most of the time, no one go around except for a scuba toy who is looking for usable parts and treasures. Maybe players can find helpful items or clues.

 

Vivarium where the lizards were raised, the outrageous dinosaur figures lives only.
With its powerful resin, it's hard to survive if you're bitten by this dinosaur figure.

 

The abandoned freezer frozen as like a snowfield. Maybe you'll encounter a polar bear figure!

 

 

Devota Hill is made up of interesting environments created by the coexistence of humans and toys.

Mr.M is threatened or helped in this environment. You are the lord of toys. With all your toys paying attention to you, think only about salvaging the world of threatened toys!

 

We are trying to express the effects of light sources, liquids, fire, rain, snow, and hair as natural and realistic as possible by actively utilizing Physically Based Rendering.

A rat that threatens Mr. M moves as fast as a real mouse and learns the information around it.

Weaveractive team emphasizes the realistic effects of environmental factors such as the surface of the character that gets wet in the rain, trace left over the sticking snow, snow layered on the surface.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

KEEP OUT will distribute through STEAM (Valve Inc.) with the PC platform as a priority.

After the release of the PC version, it will also be released on console devices such as PS4 and XBOX. Currently, KEEP OUT is being developed with the English version as a priority, and will be localized (Italian, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, etc.) depending on the situation.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Weaveractive is a game studio based out of South Korea & United states.

story:
"Anche i rifiuti hanno un’anima, anche i rifiuti meritano una seconda vita."

TRASH GAME è il gioco associato al lungometraggio d’animazione Trash, che verrà distribuito nelle sale Italiane ad Aprile. Il progetto è connotato da una forte componente educativa, l’intento principale è quello di consentire all’utente di abituarsi alla divisione sistematica dei rifiuti domestici seguendo le corrette regole del riciclo. 

Scatole, bottiglie di plastica, lattine, spazzatura. Abbandonate in strada, nei mercati, sotto i ponti. Ignorati da chiunque. Inanimati. Finché non cala notte...

Slim è una scatola di cartone rassegnata al suo destino, il suo amico Bubbles è una bottiglia di plastica. Slim non crede più a nulla, neanche alla leggenda della Piramide Magica: un luogo mitico in cui è possibile per i rifiuti avere una seconda vita. 

L’arrivo di Spark, una scatola diversa da tutti gli altri rifiuti, trascinerà Slim e Bubbles in un’avventura fantastica che cambierà le loro vite per sempre.  

In un periodo storico come questo, è il momento di cercare soluzioni che incoraggino un cambiamento radicale nello stile di vita, educando ad un consumo consapevole e al corretto smaltimento dei rifiuti ovunque nel mondo.

Nel film d’animazione Trash abbiamo dato vita ad eroi di plastica, carta, vetro ed ogni altra tipologia di materiale (riciclabile e non).   

Il film è un forte strumento per sensibilizzare il pubblico sul tema, ma volevamo di più. Trash Game ci è sembrata pertanto una coerente continuazione del nostro progetto, dandoci la possibilità di influenzare i comportamenti quotidiani delle persone in modo interattivo educandole attivamente al corretto smaltimento dei rifiuti domestici.

In altre parole: se il film Trash rappresenta la vetrina sull’importanza del tema, il gioco assolve alla funzione prettamente educativa, attraverso un sistema di intrattenimento.

Al giocatore viene chiesto di posizionare nei corretti cassonetti il materiale da riciclare che verrà poi accumulato e riutilizzarlo nel CENTRO DEL RICICLO per creare nuovi oggetti e personaggi del film.

 

 

Inserendo nel macchinario del riciclo i materiali raccolti nella sezione PLAY sarà possibile creare nuovi oggetti e personaggi del film. Per produrli il giocatore dovrà seguire ricette specifiche, che verranno sbloccate accumulando i materiali nella sezione PLAY.

 

 

Qui in SUNSET ALLEY verranno messi a disposizione sfondi originali del film Trash. Posizionando i personaggi del film e gli oggetti creati nel CENTRO DEL RICICLO, l’utente avrà la possibilità di creare scene personalizzate e farne uno screenshot da condividere con gli amici. 

 

 

È la sezione educativa del gioco dove verranno fornite informazioni sui materiali riciclabili e sul corretto smaltimento dei rifiuti. 

Qui sono raccolti i vari simboli riportati su oggetti e imballaggi di uso comune. Selezionando un simbolo (o il materiale a cui si riferisce) sarà possibile conoscerne l’origine e la modalità di recupero. Si potranno inoltre trovare curiosità sul riciclo, iniziative positive da tutto il mondo, suggerimenti e molto ancora! 

La Al-One è una casa di produzione audiovisiva in cui è centrale lo studio di animazione diretto da capi reparto provenienti dalle più grandi realtà internazionali dell’industria cinematografica. Il nostro scopo è quello di creare una realtà del tutto nuova nel panorama creativo europeo, che produca contenuti di altissima qualità soprattutto per il mercato internazionale.  

Sotto la guida del fondatore dell’azienda, Alan Vele, la Al-One è diventata un’officina per registi, scrittori, disegnatori, musicisti, professionisti del VFX, animatori ed artisti in genere. La crescita è stata naturale fino a costituire un epicentro creativo unico nel suo genere dove sviluppare prodotti di alto profilo in un ambiente professionale che prende spunto dalle logiche della famiglia.  

Anche se non dovessimo raggiungere il budget richiesto, Trash Game sarà distribuito tra fine Marzo ed Aprile 2020. Provvederemo ad autofinanziare la restante parte del progetto, per essere certi che il nostro lavoro possa continuare.

Abbiamo preso l’impegno di dare vita a questo progetto e non ci fermeremo fin quando non sarà completato. Questa somma ci permetterà di rimanere indipendenti e fedeli ai nostri obiettivi principali.  

Tutto ciò che riusciremo ad ottenere grazie a voi, verrà impiegato esclusivamente per sviluppare Trash Game come segue:

story_txt:
"Anche i rifiuti hanno un’anima, anche i rifiuti meritano una seconda vita."
TRASH GAME è il gioco associato al lungometraggio d’animazione Trash, che verrà distribuito nelle sale Italiane ad Aprile. Il progetto è connotato da una forte componente educativa, l’intento principale è quello di consentire all’utente di abituarsi alla divisione sistematica dei rifiuti domestici seguendo le corrette regole del riciclo. 



Scatole, bottiglie di plastica, lattine, spazzatura. Abbandonate in strada, nei mercati, sotto i ponti. Ignorati da chiunque. Inanimati. Finché non cala notte...
Slim è una scatola di cartone rassegnata al suo destino, il suo amico Bubbles è una bottiglia di plastica. Slim non crede più a nulla, neanche alla leggenda della Piramide Magica: un luogo mitico in cui è possibile per i rifiuti avere una seconda vita. 
L’arrivo di Spark, una scatola diversa da tutti gli altri rifiuti, trascinerà Slim e Bubbles in un’avventura fantastica che cambierà le loro vite per sempre.  

In un periodo storico come questo, è il momento di cercare soluzioni che incoraggino un cambiamento radicale nello stile di vita, educando ad un consumo consapevole e al corretto smaltimento dei rifiuti ovunque nel mondo.
Nel film d’animazione Trash abbiamo dato vita ad eroi di plastica, carta, vetro ed ogni altra tipologia di materiale (riciclabile e non).   
Il film è un forte strumento per sensibilizzare il pubblico sul tema, ma volevamo di più. Trash Game ci è sembrata pertanto una coerente continuazione del nostro progetto, dandoci la possibilità di influenzare i comportamenti quotidiani delle persone in modo interattivo educandole attivamente al corretto smaltimento dei rifiuti domestici.
In altre parole: se il film Trash rappresenta la vetrina sull’importanza del tema, il gioco assolve alla funzione prettamente educativa, attraverso un sistema di intrattenimento.


Al giocatore viene chiesto di posizionare nei corretti cassonetti il materiale da riciclare che verrà poi accumulato e riutilizzarlo nel CENTRO DEL RICICLO per creare nuovi oggetti e personaggi del film.  Inserendo nel macchinario del riciclo i materiali raccolti nella sezione PLAY sarà possibile creare nuovi oggetti e personaggi del film. Per produrli il giocatore dovrà seguire ricette specifiche, che verranno sbloccate accumulando i materiali nella sezione PLAY.  Qui in SUNSET ALLEY verranno messi a disposizione sfondi originali del film Trash. Posizionando i personaggi del film e gli oggetti creati nel CENTRO DEL RICICLO, l’utente avrà la possibilità di creare scene personalizzate e farne uno screenshot da condividere con gli amici.   È la sezione educativa del gioco dove verranno fornite informazioni sui materiali riciclabili e sul corretto smaltimento dei rifiuti. Qui sono raccolti i vari simboli riportati su oggetti e imballaggi di uso comune. Selezionando un simbolo (o il materiale a cui si riferisce) sarà possibile conoscerne l’origine e la modalità di recupero. Si potranno inoltre trovare curiosità sul riciclo, iniziative positive da tutto il mondo, suggerimenti e molto ancora! La Al-One è una casa di produzione audiovisiva in cui è centrale lo studio di animazione diretto da capi reparto provenienti dalle più grandi realtà internazionali dell’industria cinematografica. Il nostro scopo è quello di creare una realtà del tutto nuova nel panorama creativo europeo, che produca contenuti di altissima qualità soprattutto per il mercato internazionale.  Sotto la guida del fondatore dell’azienda, Alan Vele, la Al-One è diventata un’officina per registi, scrittori, disegnatori, musicisti, professionisti del VFX, animatori ed artisti in genere. La crescita è stata naturale fino a costituire un epicentro creativo unico nel suo genere dove sviluppare prodotti di alto profilo in un ambiente professionale che prende spunto dalle logiche della famiglia.  

Anche se non dovessimo raggiungere il budget richiesto, Trash Game sarà distribuito tra fine Marzo ed Aprile 2020. Provvederemo ad autofinanziare la restante parte del progetto, per essere certi che il nostro lavoro possa continuare.
Abbiamo preso l’impegno di dare vita a questo progetto e non ci fermeremo fin quando non sarà completato. Questa somma ci permetterà di rimanere indipendenti e fedeli ai nostri obiettivi principali.  
Tutto ciò che riusciremo ad ottenere grazie a voi, verrà impiegato esclusivamente per sviluppare Trash Game come segue:

story:
Our Story

Hello world! My name is Jeremy Gann, many years ago I decided to take a leap of faith and went out on my own to create custom fabricated plastic cases to house retro/classic console games for myself, I shared my creations with the world...  and it has taken me on a wonderful journey filled with great people and amazing game collections! The "Old-School Gamer" community is truly filled with heartfelt men and women! :) 

As the game cases have grown over the years, so have the community's requests for new cases to be born into the world. One of the collections that has constantly come up in conversations is the Virtual Boy collection.   So! Let's make this game case a reality together!

To the Specifics! 

So! The largest hurdle these cases have is the mold cost. All our cases are created with Plastic Mold Injection. We use Steel Molds, which produce the cleanest, sharpest, end product. The plastic we use as well is premium high quality "PP" plastic. (True colors, no odor, a quality plastic that you would expect from a good, sturdy, game case.)

This Campaign is set at $15,000; This will cover the mold creation plus the first production run.

If for some reason this campaign's contributions are on the low-end we will keep everyone in the loop! We will not be touching these funds until to are ready to take these cases into production!

Please Spread the News! You Can Help Too! <3

Everyone knows a "Gamer" and most people know there are 2 main Gamers (New Gen. or Retro Die-Hards) Please share news! You never know who's out there wishing they had some way to display their Virtual Boy game collection up on a shelf!

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm a Spanish game developer focused on making indie titles. Due to health issues, I had to quit college temporarily. I'm now pursuing my dream of becoming an independent game developer through this campaign.
  • I want to contribute to the roguelike genre, which has been a source of entertainment for the past few years and is becoming more and more popular every day.
  • I would be very happy if we could get about 1500 backers to support this project.

What I Need & What You Get:

  • I need about 5000 euros to be able to hire better artists and musicians and to pay licences.
  • I'll provide each backer with their names on the credits. 
  • If I don' t make my goal I still plan on trying to hire artists and musicians. 

The Impact

  • I'm trying to contribute to the roguelike genre by making a game in a unique setting. The game takes place on Mars and features storytelling. We're dreaming big. We plan to have 8 characters or more in this game, with each and every one of them giving a completely different playing experience, including but not limited to: Different shops, different secrets, different vehicles, upgrades, powers, items & skills. We believe that hiring the right managers and the right programmers and artists will make our dream possible.

Risks & Challenges

  • I have studied some computer science and have been making games for the past 5 years. Nevertheless, finishing a game can be quite difficult and I need some financial support.
  • I'll be working on this project full time until it is finished.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you'd like to contribute but you can't pay you can always spread the word!
  • Make sure to use indiegogo's sharing tools!

story:
Welcome to Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign for FASTED, the next-generation car racing web browser game by RAGASOFT!

Church's bells are ringing, and you just walked out of the club, ready to boost your adrenaline and forget about your father, and your sister and everything that's on your chest. By getting yourself into the custom made Nissan GT-R, you feel closer to home, and closer to the streets you've grown up. Wham! Now it's time for payback... You've always hated to shut your mouth up and to bend your head, because you are nobody. Now's different. Your life, your family and everything you've fought for is on the line, because of someone's grasping desire to get more and more. It's go time, it's time to rice for life in the streets of L.A.!

You'll start the game with a basic car, that you'll be able to customize during your gameplay. You'll also be associated with a specific driver you choose early on (that gives you different bonuses, for example: +10 stability of the car and +20% chance to get xDouble rewards if you win). You'll be able to spend your money on purchasing new cars, customizing your current cars (rims, engines, etc.). Your major goal will be to get on the top of the rank-list and guarantee your spot of winning a real-life rewards. The gameplay will have varieties of different situations that will highly depends on the users' decisions during the gameplay. You'll be able to form a team with all your friends and help each others, in order to win the race of your life.

Higher statistics give you a better chance to win a race and get a reward which you'll be able to invest into your vehicle, driver or anything else you can think of.

You'll be able to fulfill missions within the story of the game and earn extra rewards on each mission you have completed. Higher mission completions would give you experience points helping you to level-up and unlock varies of new features.

FASTED's blog is the place where you'll find the latest updates, links to facebook mini-games (i.e. the first 10 people who liked the post - get 5,000$ In-Game), contests and anything else regarding the World of FASTED.


The platform has its own messages system, that allows you to message your friends in-game, share your gameplay experience and help each others.

In order to help you get your friends in FASTED we have added an affiliate program what would give you varies of bonuses and extras for each registered player affiliated from you personal FASTED link.

The system messages platform shows you the latest notifications, regarding your account (i.e. level-ups, earned bonuses, mission completions, etc.)

Higher fuel left in the tank, mean higher number of races you are able to make. You earn a reward from each race won, so it's definitely worthy having a good quantity left in your tank.

Your in-game money and gold are everything you need in order to customize your vehicle with a new engine, turbo, carburetor, etc.

The in-game glory unlocks specific appearance items for your car, such as spoilers, stickers, carbon hood, etc.

In the driver's page you can hire a driver, which would allow you to begin customizing your car (unlocks tuning shop).

Each driver gives you specific skills that increase your vehicle's statistics and your chances to win a race. By leveling-up you'll be unlocking more advanced drivers that come with higher skills.

The tune shop gives you varies of customizations you can do on your car - from autoparts to uniques body-kits.

From the shop you can purchase any vehicle you want in case you have the required glory, money (+gold for rare vehicles) for it.

The races page is where you race with other drivers and warn rewards and points for you and your team (if you have joined or created one). There is a daily leaderboard where you can follow up the top drivers for the day and the points they earned from their races. Below you can compare your statistics to your opponents ones and decide whether you'll win or not. You can even bet on your win and earn extra rewards if that happens.


Hi everyone. We’re Denis and Lazar, founders of FASTED and we’re delighted to show you the first trailer of the game we’ve created. FASTED is not just about cars and racing, it's about how you can unite with your friends and bring your friendship to a whole new level, by simply playing and having fun. We are a team of developers joint under RAGASOFT that is constantly striving to produce the highest quality work for each and every project. It’s important for us to build a relationship with each of our players—the more we know about you, what you like, and what you love, the better we can improve the game and add cool features you would love to play. We have a world-class design and development team that brings ideas to life. First and foremost, we’re professionals. But we believe a key part of being a professional is enjoying the work that we do. We make it a point to invite a random player to our offices once a month so we can get an actual feedback that would help us improve the game. We’re very proud of the culture here at RAGASOFT, and it spills into the work we do for our players.

RAGASOFT has been producing FASTED since 2014. We are a team of 11 people dedicating every-breath of their body to release the beta version of the game. Our team is currently separated on three vital parts that drive the development. 

Denis Saidov, the Founder of FASTED, is the Art Director and Head of the Web Designers' Team, which make sure that every-single illustration is as closest as possible to the reality.

Lazar Georgiev, the Co-Founder of FASTED, is the Technology Director & Head of the Web Developers' Team, which make sure that every-single line of code works as efficient as the gear-shifting of your car.

Ivan Georgiev is the Lead Tester & Head of the Testers' Team, which make sure that every-single part of the game turn its ignition right away, without any glitches and security breaches.

First of all, we have chosen the Euro currency because we live in Europe and it makes things much easier for us from a bureaucratic standpoint. Apart from this, 6,000€ is the amount that we believe would help us make the game with the highest quality as possible and bring it to the crowd. Why do we need them?


A truly great game is ultimately defined by the integration of its features and design. And that's why we are focusing on creating the very-best design and illustrations, in order to define a truly singular user experience for our players.
Your every-day life is extremely dynamic and what we'd love to bring your joy everywhere with you on your smartphone, tablet or any other portable device. In order to do so our team is working on developing iOS, Android and Windows Phone applications.


As the game has the very-best security, it's truly a challenge to find someone who'll be able to hack it and find the breaches into the code. That's why we will hire white-hack-hackers to track and eliminate possible breaches.

One of the final parts of the development of the game are the additional expenses for VPS servers and other software solutions that would significantly smooth your gameplay experience, through the world of FASTED!

story_txt:
Welcome to Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign for FASTED, the next-generation car racing web browser game by RAGASOFT!



Church's bells are ringing, and you just walked out of the club, ready to boost your adrenaline and forget about your father, and your sister and everything that's on your chest. By getting yourself into the custom made Nissan GT-R, you feel closer to home, and closer to the streets you've grown up. Wham! Now it's time for payback... You've always hated to shut your mouth up and to bend your head, because you are nobody. Now's different. Your life, your family and everything you've fought for is on the line, because of someone's grasping desire to get more and more. It's go time, it's time to rice for life in the streets of L.A.!


You'll start the game with a basic car, that you'll be able to customize during your gameplay. You'll also be associated with a specific driver you choose early on (that gives you different bonuses, for example: +10 stability of the car and +20% chance to get xDouble rewards if you win). You'll be able to spend your money on purchasing new cars, customizing your current cars (rims, engines, etc.). Your major goal will be to get on the top of the rank-list and guarantee your spot of winning a real-life rewards. The gameplay will have varieties of different situations that will highly depends on the users' decisions during the gameplay. You'll be able to form a team with all your friends and help each others, in order to win the race of your life.


Higher statistics give you a better chance to win a race and get a reward which you'll be able to invest into your vehicle, driver or anything else you can think of.
You'll be able to fulfill missions within the story of the game and earn extra rewards on each mission you have completed. Higher mission completions would give you experience points helping you to level-up and unlock varies of new features.FASTED's blog is the place where you'll find the latest updates, links to facebook mini-games (i.e. the first 10 people who liked the post - get 5,000$ In-Game), contests and anything else regarding the World of FASTED.



The platform has its own messages system, that allows you to message your friends in-game, share your gameplay experience and help each others.
In order to help you get your friends in FASTED we have added an affiliate program what would give you varies of bonuses and extras for each registered player affiliated from you personal FASTED link.
The system messages platform shows you the latest notifications, regarding your account (i.e. level-ups, earned bonuses, mission completions, etc.)

Higher fuel left in the tank, mean higher number of races you are able to make. You earn a reward from each race won, so it's definitely worthy having a good quantity left in your tank.Your in-game money and gold are everything you need in order to customize your vehicle with a new engine, turbo, carburetor, etc.
The in-game glory unlocks specific appearance items for your car, such as spoilers, stickers, carbon hood, etc.



In the driver's page you can hire a driver, which would allow you to begin customizing your car (unlocks tuning shop).

Each driver gives you specific skills that increase your vehicle's statistics and your chances to win a race. By leveling-up you'll be unlocking more advanced drivers that come with higher skills.
The tune shop gives you varies of customizations you can do on your car - from autoparts to uniques body-kits.
From the shop you can purchase any vehicle you want in case you have the required glory, money (+gold for rare vehicles) for it.
The races page is where you race with other drivers and warn rewards and points for you and your team (if you have joined or created one). There is a daily leaderboard where you can follow up the top drivers for the day and the points they earned from their races. Below you can compare your statistics to your opponents ones and decide whether you'll win or not. You can even bet on your win and earn extra rewards if that happens.



Hi everyone. We’re Denis and Lazar, founders of FASTED and we’re delighted to show you the first trailer of the game we’ve created. FASTED is not just about cars and racing, it's about how you can unite with your friends and bring your friendship to a whole new level, by simply playing and having fun. We are a team of developers joint under RAGASOFT that is constantly striving to produce the highest quality work for each and every project. It’s important for us to build a relationship with each of our players—the more we know about you, what you like, and what you love, the better we can improve the game and add cool features you would love to play. We have a world-class design and development team that brings ideas to life. First and foremost, we’re professionals. But we believe a key part of being a professional is enjoying the work that we do. We make it a point to invite a random player to our offices once a month so we can get an actual feedback that would help us improve the game. We’re very proud of the culture here at RAGASOFT, and it spills into the work we do for our players. 



RAGASOFT has been producing FASTED since 2014. We are a team of 11 people dedicating every-breath of their body to release the beta version of the game. Our team is currently separated on three vital parts that drive the development. 
Denis Saidov, the Founder of FASTED, is the Art Director and Head of the Web Designers' Team, which make sure that every-single illustration is as closest as possible to the reality.
Lazar Georgiev, the Co-Founder of FASTED, is the Technology Director & Head of the Web Developers' Team, which make sure that every-single line of code works as efficient as the gear-shifting of your car.
Ivan Georgiev is the Lead Tester & Head of the Testers' Team, which make sure that every-single part of the game turn its ignition right away, without any glitches and security breaches.
  


 
First of all, we have chosen the Euro currency because we live in Europe and it makes things much easier for us from
a bureaucratic standpoint. Apart from this, 6,000€ is the amount that we believe would help us make the game with the highest quality as possible and bring it to
the crowd. Why do we need them?

A truly great game is ultimately defined by the integration of its features and design. And that's why we are focusing on creating the very-best design and illustrations, in order to define a truly singular user experience for our players.
Your every-day life is extremely dynamic and what we'd love to bring your joy everywhere with you on your smartphone, tablet or any other portable device. In order to do so our team is working on developing iOS, Android and Windows Phone applications.





As the game has the very-best security, it's truly a challenge to find someone who'll be able to hack it and find the breaches into the code. That's why we will hire white-hack-hackers to track and eliminate possible breaches.

One of the final parts of the development of the game are the additional expenses for VPS servers and other software solutions that would significantly smooth your gameplay experience, through the world of FASTED!

story:
Ludo, which is Latin for "I play", is the most played board game in Nigeria. It's also played in most parts of the world, so if you search the popular app stores for Ludo, you're likely to find almost a dozen versions of the game. But the rules differ from country to country, and there's nowhere to download a Ludo game that plays with the Nigerian rules! That's where we come in. We have been working on this game for a while, and before the end of the year 2015, we can have a Nigerian-themed Ludo game on iPads, iPhones, Android devices and Windows 10 devices.


What we need: The game isn't too large, we have covered the cost of all the art work, modelling, music and programming. We need at least $1,000 for two things right now:  to keep the game's servers running and to run a small marketing campaign in Nigeria. This game was made with Nigerians in mind, and it won't be any good if the game is out but no one has heard about it, so the few people who have the game can't find anyone to play against online.

Breakdown: We will be using the same server engine that powers games like Armello, the Photon cloud engine. With modest to medium size traffic, the server's will only cost $65, but if the game is more successful than we anticipate, we'll need to scale up, and that would cost about $65 monthly. With $390, we're sure we won't have server problems for at least 6 months. The rest of the money will go into Indiegogo fees and marketing the game on Nigerian channels. If we are unable to meet or at least come close to the $1,000 goal, we will spend the money only on servers, and market the game only through social media.


What you get: Depending on how much you give, you could get anything from an ad-free version of the game on your preferred mobile app store (App Store, Playstore and Windows Store only) to actually putting ads of your products in our game. You could also help shape the game by having insider access to the closed beta, the developer's blog, or the developer's audio and video podcasts. We may even throw in some limited edition Illuminare Games Studios merchandise.


The Impact: You're not just helping us build one game, you're helping us build a game studio. If this first game succeeds, we will be able to focus on much larger projects. Every member of Illuminare Game Studios is a real gamer, and we have a collective passion for creating awesome gaming experiences, including some that can educate without compromising entertainment, but we may never achieve these dreams without your help. This isn't about making a great Nigerian game. This is about creating a great entertainment company!

Risks and Challenges: Honestly, the biggest risk we can foresee is the game becoming much more successful than we anticipate, till it gets to the point that we can't handle the server costs. If this happens, we may have to shut the online section of the game down temporarily until we can get some more funds to power the servers. Other than that, the only other challenge may be bugs and other issues slowing down our development process so that we can't complete the game by October 2015. In this case, the game will remain in beta for a few more months until it's ready for launch. Also note that the game is still in development and the screenshots shown here are likely to change before the final product launches. We may also add new features or change some of those we originally intended to include. We're even thinking of making a 3D view of the board.

Other ways you can help: You may not be able to contribute any money to this project, but you can help spread the word. Tell your friends about it by social networks, talk about it on internet forums, or tell your friend's dad who owns a company that may be interested in sponsoring. It will make a big difference, and you'll be helping us start on the path towards our bigger dreams. Thanks!


UPDATE: We're toying with the idea of using stick men to represent the Ludo pieces in a 3D board. We haven't decided yet how to color code the stick men so that they don't blend in with the board. Maybe we'll leave them plain white, but they'll wear hats to show what team they're on?

story:
We enjoyed playing mobile games as a kid starting from handheld to the mobile devices of today. With the mobile era, we play mobile games as our way to relax or to escape reality - even for the tiniest moments. The long lines, the car rides, and the wait times are problems that can be solve  through our time-killer solution by pulling out our mobile phone and playing our favorite instant gratification burst of winning and unlocking virtual items and scores. 

As I grew older, I started to value my time more. I think the concept of the time is the most valuable thing we have. Gamers always love to improve their skills to get to that next level or get enough virtual coins to unlock a certain feature. To some, the heat of a good competition fuels the leaderboard scores. It takes time to practice and to perfect those skills, making them second nature. Those small amount of times we spend playing games and on phones throughout the day will slowly add up to weeks and months of spent time. 

Wouldn't it be nice to use our time more wisely by making our time spent playing games on phones more meaningful? The time spent winning virtual rewards and scores can be turn into time spent earning real money!


FOR THE COMPETITIVE GAMERS. 

It's time to take your gaming to the next level. It begins here with a creation of a an addicting, skilled-based basketball game for the iOS. 

Not just any mobile basketball game. 

A !@&#ing great one. 

The gameplay design is simple and straightforward. You play as the basketball. By having 60 seconds on shot clock, you can shoot the ball by swipe motion to the basketball hoop at different location around the basketball goalpost. 

WHY BASKETBALL?

We are currently in the midst of basketball playoff season! The competition between the playoff teams are high with great avid fans cheering on their favorite team. The heat intensifies to see which team is worthy enough to be call a championship team.

OUR PARTNERSHIP WITH A MOBILE eSPORT PLATFORM 

We will be integrating a mobile eSport platform called Skillz which enables cash tournaments to be possible on iOS mobile devices. 

Ok. Gamers. You spent valuable time refining your gaming skills for perfection. It's time to finally make it mean something real. 

If you have the skills and scores to back you up, would you dare to bet real money on yourself to beat other players and rise to the top?

Check out the crazy amount of money skilled gamers are winning everyday for being great at a game. 

This screenshot statistic is taken straight from the Skillz website on 5/9/2015. A total amount from all the different Skillz integrated games. 
Players are winnings thousands of dollars in cash and prizes every day. 

Wouldn't you want to win some of that money too?

HOW DOES SKILLZ WORK?

Choose the amount of real money that you are wanting to bet. Asynchronous multiplayer matchmaking system will pair you with an evenly matched opponent that bet the same amount of money as you. Play and achieve a higher score than your opponent and win real money!

The Development Process

I have a great team in place that is ready to make a competitive, realistic skill-based 3D basketball game into reality. The crowdfunding will be towards creating a realistic gameplay experience in the game with the baskeball's physics and behaviors. It's to mimic the basketball's as close as possible to realism.

Estimated time of release on the iOS devices Early August 2015. 

The goal is to create a fair skill-based game environment where the only that separates you and your opponent are skills alone and not fluff stuff like boosters and perks. Also, the quality of graphics will be top-notched, providing a real immersive environment for the players to play. 

If our funding goal is not reached, we may have to sacrifice a bit of graphic design quality and customization in order to finish the game.

MILESTONES

$5,000 (our targeted goal) - iOS 8+ Universal Support for iPhones and iPads

$10,000 - 4.1.x Jelly Bean+ Android Support. Due to Google Play no real money betting policy, we will provide a workaround solution through other Android stores like Amazon Kindle and Appbrain App Market to enable cash tournaments. 

All perks starting from $50+ will receive this awesome shirt!


The Revolution of eSport Competitive Mobile Gaming

I think that we can change the mobile gaming industry where practicing gaming skills and winning rewards actually have real meaning and a purpose. It begins here in this campaign. The skill-based gaming concept and cash tournaments integration ideas do not have to stop with just this basketball game. I can extend this concept to other games in future, like to other sports games, flappy bird style games, or any twitch quick reflexes style games. The possibilities are endless.

If this campaign reached the targeted goal, it only validates that some people really want to strive and to play competitively. So, they can earn real rewards for investing their time practicing and perfecting a gaming skill.

You don't have to be fancy professional gamer on a brand name gaming team to make money for being great a game.

You can just be you.  

Risks & Restrictions

The Skillz tournament platform does use a geo-locating feature to determine, if you are eligible and legally able to play in real money betting tournaments. Due to no money betting laws in specific states, players in those restricted states and countries will not be able to play in the cash tournaments. If you are out of the United States and are interested in supporting this campaign, contact me to see if your country is able to play in cash tournaments.

13 Restricted States: Arizona, Arkansas, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Maryland, Montana, South Carolina, South Dakota, and Tennessee. 

Spread the Word

We need your help to spread the world about the next revolution in mobile gaming. Tell your friends and families about earning money for being great and playing a game. Do you know a gaming or tech journalist?  Share them a link to this page and show them the next big thing!
story_txt:
We enjoyed playing mobile games as a kid starting from handheld to the mobile devices of today. With the mobile era, we play mobile games as our way to relax or to escape reality - even for the tiniest moments. The long lines, the car rides, and the wait times are problems that can be solve  through our time-killer solution by pulling out our mobile phone and playing our favorite instant gratification burst of winning and unlocking virtual items and scores. 
As I grew older, I started to value my time more. I think the concept of the time is the most valuable thing we have. Gamers always love to improve their skills to get to that next level or get enough virtual coins to unlock a certain feature. To some, the heat of a good competition fuels the leaderboard scores. It takes time to practice and to perfect those skills, making them second nature. Those small amount of times we spend playing games and on phones throughout the day will slowly add up to weeks and months of spent time. 
Wouldn't it be nice to use our time more wisely by making our time spent playing games on phones more meaningful? The time spent winning virtual rewards and scores can be turn into time spent earning real money!






FOR THE COMPETITIVE GAMERS. 
It's time to take your gaming to the next level. It begins here with a creation of a an addicting, skilled-based basketball game for the iOS. 
Not just any mobile basketball game. 

A !@&#ing great one. 



The gameplay design is simple and straightforward. You play as the basketball. By having 60 seconds on shot clock, you can shoot the ball by swipe motion to the basketball hoop at different location around the basketball goalpost. 
WHY BASKETBALL?
We are currently in the midst of basketball playoff season! The competition between the playoff teams are high with great avid fans cheering on their favorite team. The heat intensifies to see which team is worthy enough to be call a championship team.
OUR PARTNERSHIP WITH A MOBILE eSPORT PLATFORM 
We will be integrating a mobile eSport platform called Skillz which enables cash tournaments to be possible on iOS mobile devices. 
Ok. Gamers. You spent valuable time refining your gaming skills for perfection. It's time to finally make it mean something real. 
If you have the skills and scores to back you up, would you dare to bet real money on yourself to beat other players and rise to the top?
Check out the crazy amount of money skilled gamers are winning everyday for being great at a game. 
This screenshot statistic is taken straight from the Skillz website on 5/9/2015. A total amount from all the different Skillz integrated games. Players are winnings thousands of dollars in cash and prizes every day. 

Wouldn't you want to win some of that money too?
HOW DOES SKILLZ WORK?
Choose the amount of real money that you are wanting to bet. Asynchronous multiplayer matchmaking system will pair you with an evenly matched opponent that bet the same amount of money as you. Play and achieve a higher score than your opponent and win real money!



The Development Process
I have a great team in place that is ready to make a competitive, realistic skill-based 3D basketball game into reality. The crowdfunding will be towards creating a realistic gameplay experience in the game with the baskeball's physics and behaviors. It's to mimic the basketball's as close as possible to realism.
Estimated time of release on the iOS devices Early August 2015. 
The goal is to create a fair skill-based game environment where the only that separates you and your opponent are skills alone and not fluff stuff like boosters and perks. Also, the quality of graphics will be top-notched, providing a real immersive environment for the players to play. 

If our funding goal is not reached, we may have to sacrifice a bit of graphic design quality and customization in order to finish the game.


MILESTONES
$5,000 (our targeted goal) - iOS 8+ Universal Support for iPhones and iPads
$10,000 - 4.1.x Jelly Bean+ Android Support. Due to Google Play no real money betting policy, we will provide a workaround solution through other Android stores like Amazon Kindle and Appbrain App Market to enable cash tournaments. 
All perks starting from $50+ will receive this awesome shirt!



The Revolution of eSport Competitive Mobile Gaming
I think that we can change the mobile gaming industry where practicing gaming skills and winning rewards actually have real meaning and a purpose. It begins here in this campaign. The skill-based gaming concept and cash tournaments integration ideas do not have to stop with just this basketball game. I can extend this concept to other games in future, like to other sports games, flappy bird style games, or any twitch quick reflexes style games. The possibilities are endless.

If this campaign reached the targeted goal, it only validates that some people really want to strive and to play competitively. So, they can earn real rewards for investing their time practicing and perfecting a gaming skill.
You don't have to be fancy professional gamer on a brand name gaming team to make money for being great a game.You can just be you.  Risks & RestrictionsThe Skillz tournament platform does use a geo-locating feature to determine, if you are eligible and legally able to play in real money betting tournaments. Due to no money betting laws in specific states, players in those restricted states and countries will not be able to play in the cash tournaments. If you are out of the United States and are interested in supporting this campaign, contact me to see if your country is able to play in cash tournaments.13 Restricted States: Arizona, Arkansas, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Maryland, Montana, South Carolina, South Dakota, and Tennessee. Spread the WordWe need your help to spread the world about the next revolution in mobile gaming. Tell your friends and families about earning money for being great and playing a game. Do you know a gaming or tech journalist?  Share them a link to this page and show them the next big thing!

story:
Short Summary


I am a sole developer of a ninja style free ios game seeking the money to cover sales license and submission application fees for android and in time ios. Their is a playable demo available for PC, though this game is multiplayer only the demo is a single player version that highlights the level design's and player mechanics. When I reach the funding goal I will be releasing the game, everything has been tested including the network. I will be submitting it through google play but will make the .apk available for those wishing it before the review process has finished. Keep in mind the game was set up for android aspect ratios and touchscreen but for this demo specifically uses keyboard controls and the buttons have been hidden. The demo will be available within a day of this launch.

What We Need & What You Get


  • I will require $800 for android and ios license, $25 for submission fees for google play and $100 for apple store, and $100 for server CCU usage to start. As the game will be free their will be ad's which will fund the remaining required CCU usage.
  • I designed this game to capture the attention of those who love interactive game mechanics such as: Zip line, Grappling hook/swing, Ninja Stars, Smoke bombs, Explosive Vials, Double Jump, Wall Climb etc.
  • If I am unable to obtain the required  amount for the license and submission fee's the funds will be still used for assistance in me covering the remaining amount, though this will set back release to a later date.

The Impact



  • I designed this game to give the player a quick yet enjoyable experience in which he or she can become the master, battling against oppenets multiple opponents.
  • The network was designed to take minimal time for finding a appropriate game with no work from the player. The match's will have a max player count of 4.
  • The game was also made to focus on player creation and customization. Each player will be able to create a character through procedural generation and height displacement to alter hair, face features, and colors for all.


Risks & Challenges

  • The only challenge will be to obtain the license and ccu usage expense. This will allow for the game to be available on the market. As all the systems have been checked for functionality and I am happy with the results.
  • If I am unable to obtain the funds i need to obtain the license and ccu usage expense. I will have to delay the submission and release. Though this project will come to play no matter if it is sooner or later.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would like to let everyone know that in addition to any help with obtaining our goal anyone who would be interested in helping share the project with their friends even if its only a like. I have currently set up a facebook fanpage, linked below, to help promote the game. Thank you even if it was only to take the time to look as possibly Like. As well as anyone who shares this with friends

Mini Ninja Brawl

story:
" Daemon vous transporte dans une réalité alternative dominée par l’Institution, un mouvement religieux. Dans ce monde, les artisans sont les plus respectés, les scribes et instituteurs maîtrisent l’art littéraire, mais chacun se concentre sur la place qu’il occupe dans cette société aux us et coutumes bien encadrés par l’Institution et ses administrateurs. La lumière bleue, inépuisable, est la source d’énergie des habitants de ce Rouen alternatif, divisé en quartiers séparés par de hauts murs de pierre. Votre futur personnage mène une vie paisible rythmée par ses excursions sur l'Île de l'Institution, véritable cœur d'activité artisanale qui accueille les échoppes les plus renommées, mais dont l'accès règlementé en fonction du quartier de résidence de chacun rappelle une hiérarchie sociale subie. Qu’il soit apprenti, ouvrier, guide porteur voire scribe, son existence va bientôt être tourmentée et il devra faire des choix qui le mèneront vers une épique destinée parsemée de chance, de rencontres, de peurs et de découvertes. Ce livre de base vous apporte tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour créer votre personnage, qu'il soit humain ou daemon, ainsi que les outils pour créer un binôme cohérent, pour de riches interactions lors de vos parties. Il propose la découverte du daemon d6 système, facile à prendre en main et qui se joue idéalement avec le d6 daemon. Une partie maître du jeu révèle quelques aspects du jeu pour une meilleure vision de l'univers, elle est agrémentée d'un scénario de départ qui se poursuivra ensuite dans les suppléments à venir.

Votre avenir est à portée de dés "

Le système Daemon d6

Daemon adopte son propre système de jeu, où les réussites s'obtiennent grâce à des figures ou des combinaisons de figures. Il offre une simplicité de jeu et une évolution des compétences en rapport avec l'expérience du personnage. Dans la partie création de personnage, il a été établi trois caractéristiques primaires déterminant le physique, l'intellect et l'allure des humains et daemons, dans lesquelles un certain nombre de points de création ont été à répartir. S'en suit pour l'humain une série de caractéristiques secondaires différentes de la série de caractéristiques secondaires du daemon, mais les lancers de dés seront à effectuer de la même manière, contrairement aux compétences métiers (uniquement pour l'humain).

Voici comment procéder à un test de caractéristique secondaire :

Test = A (niveau de la caractéristique secondaire) + B (niveau de la caractéristique primaire associée)

En effet, chaque caractéristique secondaire est associée à l'une des caractéristiques primaires représentant la manière dont le personnage utilise ses attributs naturels pour accomplir une tâche. Le niveau de base (sans modificateur de race ou autre) ne pourra être supérieur au score de la caractéristique primaire associée. Par exemple, un personnage ne pourra pas avoir un score de dextérité plus haut que son score de physique.



Kit d'introduction

disponible depuis novembre 2014, une page lui est dédié sur le grog

http://www.legrog.org/jeux/daemon 

Voici une vidéo supplémentaire de présentation


Extras : selon le succès de cette campagne, j'ai dans l'idée d'ajouter un jeu de cartes pour les rencontres aléatoires, ainsi qu'un Artbook de personnages pré-tirés.

UN PEU PLUS D'INFOS SUR DAEMON !

Un petit update des possibilités offertes par le jeu de rôle Daemon

Qu'est-ce que les joueurs vont jouer ?

Pour ceux qui possèdent d'ores et déjà le livret d'introduction, il est tout à fait normal de se demander ce que l'on va pouvoir interpréter clairement. A fortiori davantage si l'on ne le possède pas. L'univers se pose dans un cadre bien fermé, contrôlé par l'Institution et ses administrateurs, véritable dirigeants de quartiers des cités, oeuvrant pour un administrateur général, tous pour le bien de l'Institution. En conséquences, le sentiment ressenti laisse apprécier une vie monotone, les jours se suivent et se ressemblent. En toute honnêteté, la vie de Frodon ne semblait-elle aussi si morose ? Le petit scénario du kit d'introduction donne la possibilité aux joueurs de voir un peu plus clairement surtout le système de jeu et le fait de jouer en binôme (car oui c'est bel et bien un binôme qui joue le duo humain – daemon et non pas un unique joueur!). Une fois le livre de base en main, les joueurs pourront alors créer leurs binômes, tout en ayant la possibilité de créer des personnages particuliers (en cas de joueurs impairs) et commencer l'aventure grâce au scénario de départ dont la suite se trouvera dans le livret de l'Institution, puis les campagnes. Ces personnages verront leur vision du monde bouleversée, et devront malgré eux faire des choix cruciaux, à savoir poursuivre leur quête de la vérité mêlée de danger ou bien retourner vers le monde bien encadré et monotone de l'Institution.

L'originalité de Daemon ?

Comme énoncé plus haut, le binôme humain – daemon va être joué par un binôme de joueur. Les deux victimes se réunissent pour faire leur création de perso et déterminent en premier lieu lequel va jouer l'humain et l'autre la daemon. La relation entre les deux entités est la plus forte existante connue, une réelle synergie au cours des aventures et des mésaventures, et elle sera mis à mal lors de confrontations ou à cause de l'éloignement. Le choix de la race du daemon lors de la création est relativement importante car si le daemon matérialise la conscience et l'âme de son humain, il représente de plus le potentiel inné de l'humain tel un aigle royal pour un leader en sommeil, une hyène mâle pour un humain plutôt soumis se complaisant dans un cadre matriarcale, un ours pour un humain rustre et solitaire. Ajouté à cela que le daemon permet un jugement inconscient par les autres humains. Admettons que deux personnes se croisent dans une ruelle et se toise tout en percevant le daemon de chacun, il est naturel que l'appréciation ne sera pas la même envers un daemon rhinocéros et un daemon canard.

Concernant les daemons, des capacités utilisables sans compter, apportent quelques petits bonus dans le jeu dans des domaines diverses, que ce soit pour passer un obstacle, dévier une attaque, déjouer la mort ou être sûr de trouver de quoi se nourrir.

Cela amène aux risques encourus par le binôme et les conséquences sur chacun. Si l'une des deux entités est touchée, l'autre le perçoit automatiquement et subit une part minime des dégâts, et plus les points de vie diminuent, plus l'autre adoptera un comportement insensé motivé par la survie du binôme.

Si le daemon meurt, l'humain sombre alors dans un coma irréversible. Si l'humain meurt, le daemon s'effrite et disparaît instantanément.

Les dés Daemon et le système Daemon

Daemon utilise les dés éponymes mais ils seront aussi utilisables dans les prochains jdr, et notamment Undercity, la nouvelle édition d'AmnesYa et bien d'autres.

Concernant le système de jeu, il est composé de 3 caractéristiques principales et une série de caractéristiques secondaires (compétences) et enfin des compétences métiers, uniquement pour l'humain. Si les compétences prennent leurs sources dans les caractéristiques principales lors des jets de dés par exemple un humain qui a 4 en physique et 3 en dextérité et qui souhaite faire une action athlétique qui sort de son ordinaire, il lancera donc 7 dés et tentera d'obtenir des combinaisons de lettres ( doublons, sextuples voire « daemon »). le niveau de la compétence ne peut dépasser le niveau de la caractéristique principale associée, comme dans l'exemple dextérité ne pourra dépasser 4.
le système est relativement simple et facile à prendre en main, les dés spéciaux apportent eux aussi une originalité, qui plus est lorsque l'on sait que ces mêmes dés pourront être utilisables ensuite dans d'autres jdrs.

Les compétences métiers sont liées à un apprentissage, aux formations professionnelles et sont de ce fait utilisables lors de jets de dés spécifiques, donnant un très net avantage à l'humain par rapport à un autre humain d'une tout autre profession.

Daemon, one-shot ou campagnes ?

Il y a une bonne partie du futur à moyen terme des personnages qui ne peut se dérouler en one-shot. Il y a un changement de fond qui prendra source dans le scénario du livre de base et qui se suivra dans le livret de l'Institution accompagnant l'écran de l'Institution. Les personnages passeront du stade d'anonymes à celui de personnes les plus recherchées par l'Institution, viendra à ce moment là l'opportunité de faire des sessions de one-shot entre mêlées de campagnes.

dans le livret de l'Institution accompagnant l'écran de
l'Institution. Les personnages passeront du stade d'anonymes à celui
de personnes les plus recherchées par l'Institution, viendra à ce
moment là l'opportunité de faire des sessions de one-shot entre
mêlées de campagnes.

story:
Short Summary

  Elkio is an idea borned a few months ago, when we were trying to find a way to bring beautiful photos closer to you,in a creative way that will also decorate your place and give you big smiles everytime you see them. It is a funny and creative hobby that will bring family and friends together, keeping memories alive for those of you who have visited Greece in the past or live here and giving a taste for those of you that will travel here soon.   

Hi all,
my name is Calliopi Kapousizi and i live in Greece. My dream is to start a business with pictures from Greece in the form of puzzles. Exactly yes puzzles! What a better way to bring Greece in our homes for those of you who have visited my country and witnessed the magic hidden in nature the islands the countryside an even the cities, and for those of you who wish to visit her,to have a taste.
I am 28 years old and no matter how things are in Greece today i strongly believe that we should not give up and do our best to begin investing again and create opportunities for everyone, new job positions and have things running again no matter the difficulties.
I really wish you will support this project and be a part of my dream coming true!

With love
Calliopi Kapousisi

Photographer's message:

Hello,
my name is Eleni Kitsiou and i am an amateur photographer. My desire for taking pictures was born when i was a teenager. The one who motivated me for this project , to share and bring out the beauty of my country, so that you my friends can have something to remember her has been my daughter Calliopi whom i love and thank her deeply.
I enjoy walking a lot so i spend a lot of time outside taking pictures.I ve always have and still do admire all photographers professionals and amateurs for the amazing moments they capture. Each one has a unique style, personality and that is reflected in their pictures. So , i will present mine in to your eyes hoping you will join me throught my travels!

''photography is not just art...is a soul
her silence is not invisible...you just have to open the windows of your eyes...and listen !

is the undeniable witness of a journey , with the frozen moments of life, in the dusted pages of memory ''

With respect
Eleni Kitsiou

What We Need & What You Get

  What we will do with the money asked is starting the company of course with lawyers and accountants -we wish to be legal - finding room for offices and getting equipment, printing the puzzles and creating a very good looking package, plus the e-shop, advertisement too.
   If we dont raise all the money that is needed we ll try to make it still, but it will be the hard way, so we rely on your help truly we do !

The Impact

  This project is an amazing opportunity for us to start a new business based in our country. You see Greece is being through a lot and we have to make efforts and new steps that will create new opportunities and job positions starting from a single secretary position for example to the sales department and the suppliers to the graphic designers and the web team. So funding our project is not just helping us print puzzles but is helping us transforming an idea into reality with its effects touching a line of people in this country.

  Challenges exist since we all know how difficult things are nowdays but we dont give up.We can do this, Eneryone in the entire planet is fighting every day so we 'll do the same. For that reason as soon as the e-shop will be up and running, an amount will be set aside from every purchase made as a donation for those in need. We cannot tell yet how much of that amount will be donated, but what we do know is that when help is given, the easiest thing to do is to give help back to continue this cycle and effect everyone no matter how far they are. And with your help we feel really blessed that we will achieve that and we thank you for that.

Other Ways You Can Help

  For those of you who really like this project but cannot contribute in the fundraising campaign , please let everyone know, share  the campaign everywhere, the more people know about Elkio the more are the chances to succeed our goal.

Thank you so much.
