story:
Freak: An Instant Gaming App

Freak is to introduce an Instant Gaming platform to the word. A wide range of games to be played with one and all on your phone book just on a click. Freak is to break the hazardous ways of Gaming by logging in via some social media sites revealing a lot of personal information online every time a game is to be played. Freak offers login only via your contact number and automatically adds everyone in your contact list to be able to play any games with them. Freak is to simplify the entire gaming experience. One time Login, chose the contact and start playing, indeed that simple. To make gaming more interesting Freak also allows you to chat with your gaming partner or in a group along with other unique features.

Freak was founded by 5 college pass-outs with the idea of breaking the boredom involved in chatting. The founders once passed out college went to be a part of the Silicon Valley in much reputed companies with a lot of enthusiasm, just to realize it won’t last for long. Passtimes were spent only by chatting with friends online that got boring everytime we ran out of topic. When these coffee lovers, met one evening at a café, the idea of freak took birth. The conversation was a regular one that involved how bored they were with their jobs and that chatting was the only option to fill in the hours. The co-founders, were all the cream of their own college and refused to fit it, when they could stand out.

“The idea of freak literally freaked me out with the realization that I can contribute to the world of technology and entertainment. It was the scope for me to deliver my idea at the world stage, to have something of my own, and share it to the world.” Said Aroof (Founder - Freak).


                                          

                                             Home Screen and Registration


“Chatting apps got boring after a few minutes all the time. The idea of playing a small yet exciting game with friends was just irresistible “says Mumpi (Co-founder - Freak).

                                                 Tic Tac Toe & Arm Wrestling

Slowly and steadily the whole Idea around freak was discussed over various such evening coffees, and finally we were self-assured that we wanted to bring this baby to the world. We did not even spare a second thought before leaving the Silicon Valley, since we were totally sure we are bringing something what everybody wants yet have never noticed.

“Freak could the best ice breaker / conversation filler for one and all. We are trying to keep the games that are small and exciting as well as the time taking ones, keeping in mind the amount of time one might have in hand. My favorites are the games of tic tac toe and arm wrestling that gets over in seconds, whereas Jetty prefers the prolonged game of chess” said Harsh (Co-founder – Freak).


One overwhelming part of freak is that it lets people play games with anyone in their contact list. Freak unlike other Gaming applications, is bringing a lot of games of different kinds together and at your fingertips to be played with your friends and foes instantly. The hassled process of logging in via Facebook or other social media to play an online game is not only time consuming but also lets the game application access a lot of personal data. In this context co-founder Jetty said “Some of us do not play games only because of these registrations, authentications. We could not let this same happen with Freak, thus the simplified option of playing games with your contacts. Also, the chat has cool enough features to keep the user on the application over other applications“

Every glory comes with great struggles and so does Freak. Freak from its advent has been that dream that would not let its co-founders sleep. Leaving jobs to get into start up may sound fancy but actually is not. We have spent days in utter despair and run short of money all of the times; the only thing that got us going was our belief on the application. Keeping the money constraints aside, the technical difficulties faced were humongous in nature too. The kind of features that we wanted to design Freak with were so unique that technical feasibility was always a challenge. But we have never compromised on our passion, and conveying the same to our investors so as to make sure they invest in what they must believe in. Freak is a challenging project but with most certainly change the face of instant gaming the moment it is ready to be released. The idea of Freak has never been for once been disliked by anyone, who understood the concept and the whole purpose of it.

The other important surreal features that stand out amongst rest:

1.  Multiple DPs: Tired of changing your display picture everytime you want to flaunt a new one? You really do not have to be much worried, because Freak is going to make it easier for you. Unlike the conventional, one DP, Freak will help you set up to 4 display pictures, and also allow you to set a time period after which it automatically changes to the next one. To ice the cake, each DP will have the option of a caption to be added to it.

                                              

                                 Your own Profile with multiple display pictures

2.  Tagging friends in a group: Freak unlike other applications, allows unlimited number of users to be added in a group.

                                            

                                                 Group Chat with tagging

The mute option indeed helps us avoid some annoying group, but what if you could really know how much of a huge conversation was actually addressed to you? Yes, now with freak, you can tag your friends in a group, in case something specific is to be told to him/her. Freak has also designed the idea of being able to tag a friend in your status on freak in case, the status updated is specifically for someone (special). In freak, a user needs to approve of him/her being added to a group instead of taking the pain of leaving the group later.

                                            

                                                    Tagging in status bar


3. Circular chat concept: This was an idea till now, which has been realized by freak to break the monotony of the regular looking chat screen.

What if you really did not have to enter the one-to-one chat screen, and still get a glimpse of the most preferred received chats? Yes, Freak is going to make it that user friendly in a stylish fashion with the help of the circular chat concept.

                                               

                                                       Circular Chat view

4.  One tap login: This feature I the most user friendly of all. As per the existing condition, to play a game online, we need to login via some social media to be able to play games, and also most of the times we play games with strangers although undesirably due to the existing infrastructure of online gaming. The login via a social media on the other hand also gives access to a lot of personal data, which is very critical.

Freak came along to solve this problem, by letting users login to Freak only by providing the phone number. The exchange of OTP registers the user to freak in a single click and lets them play games with anyone in the contact list without exposing any personal data.

                                                 

5.  Simultaneous Gaming and chatting:

Play games and chat with the same person or Group at the same time by tapping on the chat icon on the upper right corner and vice-versa. This allows a more interactive and fun way to play games by teasing your opponent with wide range of stickers and audio buzzes.


The vision and the purpose:

The strong clutching belief on the product that its founders has on Freak is owing to the fact that it is a very competitive product amongst all existing applications in the instant chatting and gaming field and has a lot to offer. Features and benefits being offered by Freak are quite unique in its own way when being offered by an instant gaming application that also supports chatting and other unique features.

Challenges and risks:

Challenges being faced by Freak are majorly technical challenges, since the features we are trying to bring into Freak are unique in their own way and requires a lot of R&D. “Checking of the technical feasibility and implementation of modifications to execute each and every feature is mind boggling” says Sairam (CTO Freak).

Freak has covered half its way and has covered many milestones in regard to its development. However, a lot more is to be done to make the dream of instant gaming a reality of tomorrow. We have received some investment that had made us travel so far, however we still need a lot of monetary support to keep Freak going for its final phase of development. Monetary support is indeed necessary to keep the project going and bring it to the final release.

This product was initially thought of as an ice breaker for conversations, and later on all the features and functionalities were built upon the single idea of simultaneous gaming and chatting. The idea of simultaneous gaming and chatting in a single application that allows login only via the phone number, seemed so attractive, that all the other features were decided to make the decided experience even more smooth and user friendly.

Our target audience is the world. We have not built or thought of this application targeting a small section of the society or any age group. This application has been designed in a way that one and all can use it. The application is so user friendly, that someone need not be a pro gamer to play games in it, although offers a lot of exciting features like the avatar name for a gamer and the ledger board with exciting badges to have the gamer’s interest. The chatting features that has been added as USPs are all keeping in mind the drawbacks or gap in features that the existing applications of instant chatting has, to make Freak a wholesome application, that keeps the user engaged by offering all that he has. This a world class application, and follows international standards in all aspects. All the stickers, audio buzzes and designs has been laid out keeping the international audience in mind.


Few more screens to help you get a closer look:

                             

                                              Contacts List &Grid View


                           

                                                All Chats & Audio Buzzes

                  

                                       In-App Game Center and Shake to buzz


P.S Freak is developed for iOS and Android mobile platforms.

 [a1]I Have made this change

story:
Who Are We?

We are a passionate, small group of programmers and gamers. We are students who understand many programming languages, including the development platform Unity 5. We will use the this platform to create a new  3D game for the HTC VIVE. This new dodgeball mini game will be exciting, captivating and challenging. We have decided to work with the HTC VIVE for our fun mini game, because we believe that the future of gaming is through virtual reality.

The Impact


Virtual reality. We have all heard time and time again that it is the future–The future of entertainment, the future of learning, and most of all, the future of gaming.

When one thinks of a VR game, one usually imagines a big budget, first person shooter with cutting edge graphics, a storyline written by Hollywood writers, and famous actors voicing the main characters. A game like this, of course, would be made by some large studio with dozens, or even hundreds, of people collaborating to build the game.

With our small group of designers we have set out to prove that the future of VR extends beyond high-budget games made by prominent studios. Our small, passionate group of student programmers and gamers  is set on using the advanced processing and 3D imaging power of the HTC VIVE to make one of the first smartphone-esque games for a cutting edge VR headset. Along the way, we will attempt to prove that VR game development can be done by independent developers who are not part of large companies.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • What we need with our funding goal is some special game development hardware and software to help us make the best game possible coming from a small group.

  • With our unique perks, you pay for what you want! If you don't want the game or don't own an HTC VIVE, please feel free to support us; you will get other perks that do not require a VR headset.

  • If we reach near our monetary goal but it is not entirely achieved, we will still use what we have to purchase and use the hardware  for professional game development.

Risks & Challenges

A challenge we face is making a quick connection between the connected servers for the best gameplay possible. We believe we can overcome this because we have prior knowledge to graphics compression and connection between servers.

Other Ways You Can Help

If your prefer a different kind of perk than the ones we offer here, feel free to let us know. Also, please tell your friends, family, colleagues, and anyone else you know so that we can bring this project to life. And finally, reach out to us if you have any questions.

story:
Intro

As a child of the 70s and 80s, the single-most happy childhood memory I have is the endless hours spent in the arcade with my brother. These days, every time we meet and re-count our growing up years, I yearn to re-create and re-capture those moments when the simple pleasures were about achieving top ranking on the High Score list of Pac-Man and Space Invaders.

I want to bring back the good ol' days and just be able to chill out with my brother once again and introduce the wonder of arcade games to my daughter.

I’m a "tinker-er" by nature, and love to take things apart and build stuff just for the heck of it. I used to do this late at night due to my day job. More recently, I quit my day job to try tinkering full-time!


My First Pixel Play Arcade Prototype

Based on M.A.M.E. (Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator) that I tinkered with way back in 2000, I set out in late 2014 to build a home arcade system that could play all the classic video games. After much research and trial-and-error, I built the first prototype out of vanguard sheets (paper!).

Starting Point: 1st Prototype made out of vanguard sheet

My first order of business when I started out with the vanguard sheet prototype was to source for the parts and then model the housing using Google's Sketchup 3D program. I then had to figure out how I was going to actually build the housing.


Building My First Production Pixel Play Arcade

The building of the housing evolved over time. I first decided that the most cost-effective method was to CNC-cut the material (essentially using a computer to control the cutting tool) rather that to mill by hand. The problem was that I didn't have access to any tools. So I decided to build my own. I started with a wooden version CNC router. It wasn’t pretty and neither was the cut for the housing. But it was a crucial first step towards my goal.

I then decided to build a "proper" CNC milling machine (I called it the Ox). While it worked a lot better, I was still not happy with the finishing, and the edges were rough and needed to be sanded down.  My final solution was found when I chanced upon a 60 watt laser cutter and I decided to try to laser-cut my housing.  Needless to say, it was voila and since then, I never looked back.

(Left to Right): 1st CNC routing machine built on my kitchen table; proper CNC routing machine named “Ox”; finally my laser-cutter solution.

When I finally built Pixel Play Arcade, I did not realize the significance of what I had done until I showed it to my friends. It brought back so many memories for them (they're kinda in my generation) and the Pixel Play Arcade became the talk of every party. Another surprising thing happened: our kids began to play with it too. There was instant connection across the generations and I've not seen parents and kids have fun like this in a long time: everyone was a kid in the room!

I soon started to get "orders" to produce Pixel Play Arcade for my friends. Even acquaintances and colleagues began to ask me to build it for them. It was then that I understood that this project had great potential to bring joy to so many people. 

The final finished product... Pixel Play Arcade

Why I Need Your Help

With my home-made tools, my current rate of production is about 1 per week. I estimate that with practice, I might be able to bring that down a little, but not much more. To fulfil the backlog of orders quickly (many would like me to do this by Christmas. Yikes!), I need better tools to increase my rate of production. I figured I need the following:

COST ESTIMATION
Item / Desc. Qty. @ Price
4'x8' Flatbed Laser Cutter 1 $15,000.00 $15,000.00
Compressor for Paint Works 1 $800.00 $800.00
Miscellaneous Tools 1 $1,200.00 $1,200.00
Wood Planer 1 $500.00 $500.00
Others 1 $2,500.00 $2,500.00
Total Cost Estimation $20,000.00

With the new machines, I am able to produce at a rate of 2 per day. That's more than a 10-fold increase in the production rate. With this capacity, I'll be able to fulfil orders at a much higher rate!

BUT... that's not all. Even as I am fulfilling this dream, I'm already dreaming up a  2-player Pixel Play Arcade. This is the other reason why I need better tools, especially the 4'x8' laser cutter. I have built a wood prototype of the 2-player arcade but because of the size limitation of my current laser cutter, I am not able to go much bigger. This prototype is hand-milled, which is not only painfully time consuming but also not well finished. I also built a "proof-of-concept" demonstrator using metal extrusion as a frame. I need your help to fulfil my dream!

Hand-milled 2-player prototype that is a tad raw 2-player Metal Extrusion
Possible Design of a 2-Player Pixel Play Arcade... 
 

The Pixel Play Arcade

Every Pixel Play Arcade is hand-made.

First, I laser-cut 3 pieces of 400mm x 600mm wood (one at a time). I then sand the wood, route the curves, and then lacquer them. Prior to assembly, I "wrap" the console with veneer and finally glue all the parts together.  

Routing of the wood to give it a curve and rounded ends to the console

The veneer I have chosen is one that I really like as it has a nice dark wood-like finish as shown below.

Pixel Play Arcade has the following components:

  • Raspberry Pi Version 3 (the "brain")
  • 8GB mini-SD memory card (the "hard-drive")
  • Joystick with 10 LED buttons
  • 5W, 4 ohms dual Speakers 
  • 10.1" LCD Screen with remote control
  • 8-ports 5V, 5 Amp USB
The console is installed with
  • Latest Raspbian "Jessie" (Linux for Raspberry Pi)
  • Emulationstation (Front end and emulator)
  • A few Shareware games

Pixel Play Arcade

When the arcade gets to you, all you have to do is to power on and play. If you intend to download more ROMs/games, you first have to setup a connection to your network (just like when you first buy a PC). To do that, you can follow the steps shown here and follow the section labelled "Connecting to Your Network".

After you have downloaded the ROMs/games onto your PC or Mac, follow the instructions on how to transfer the ROMs/games onto Pixel Play Arcade here or see the FAQ below.


Perks: The Portable Pixel Play Arcade (3PA)

Portable Pixel Play Arcade (this is a mouthful so I'll call it 3PA) will include all the hardware that you need to start playing classic games on your TV. Just connect the power into the console, HDMI from console to TV and turn on the Gamepads and you will have a 2-player console. When you are done, you can just plug the Gamepads into the console for charging.

The 3PA has the following components:

  • Raspberry Pi Version 3 (the "brain")
  • EU USB wall plug (micro USB cable) to power the 3PA
  • 8GB mini-SD memory card (the "hard-drive")
  • HDMI cable - to display the output to the TV
  • 2 x Bluetooth 8Bitdo Zero Gamepads
  • 2 x short micro USB cable to charge the Gamepads
Here are the specs of the components:
Housing with Raspberry Pi 3 with dimensions 95.0mm (L) x 65.0mm (W) x 30.0 (h)

 110 - 240 V
EU Wall Charger for any voltage usage around the world		 HDMI Cable that connects to the Raspberry Pi and output to TV console 2 x GamePads with charger of dimensions 75.0mm (W) x 40.0mm (D) x 15.0mm (H)

   
The finished product... the Portable Pixel Play Arcade (3PA)

The console is installed with

  • Latest Raspbian "Jessie"
  • Emulationstation
  • A few Shareware games

When the console gets to you, connect the HDMI cable to your Raspberry Pi and the other end to the HDMI port of your TV.  Plug in the power and remember to turn on your Gamepads. The 3PA will then power up you will see the main emulator screen.

Both the Gamepads should already be configured to connect to the 3PA but if for some reason it does not, follow the instructions here to connect. 

If you intend to download more ROMs/games, you have to first setup a connection to your network (just like when you first buy a PC). To do that, you can follow the steps shown here and follow the section labelled "Connecting to Your Network".

After you have downloaded the ROMs/games onto your PC or Mac, follow the instructions on how to transfer the ROMs/games onto the 3PA here or see the FAQ below.


Perks: Pixel Play Wireless Handphone Charger

As with the Pixel Play console, this is hand-made out of ply wood.  It works like a Qi charger (i.e. wireless) and the set includes a USB cable. If your handphone is wireless charging-enabled, a $28 contribution will get you this perk. 

Pixel Play Cellphone Stand

Perks: Gamepad Key Chain

As with the Pixel Play console, this is hand-made out of ply wood.  It is a key chain in the shape of a gamepad.  

Pixel Play Gamepad Key Chain

Perks: $1 Contribution

Every dollar will help me get closer to my goal of building a Pixel Play Arcade faster, and build a 2-player console as well. Without volume purchase, it is very hard for me to acquire better tools to shorten the production time, so every dollar helps.


How You Can Support Me

Amount Description
$1 Every bit counts! Thank you.
$10 Wooden Gamepad Key Chain
$28 Custom-made WIreless Handphone Charger
$149 Portable Pixel Play Arcade
$349 Pixel Play Arcade

Please note that I will include some freeware games but I cannot include all the games. I have written a tutorial on where to get the games and how to Install the games onto the Pixel Play Arcade and the 3PA.


FAQ

What does Pixel Play Arcade or the 3PA include?
Answer: The console includes everything as shown above. It comes assembled and all you have to do is to plug in the power. I will include some freeware games. To include other titles of games, you can follow the instructions shown here.

Will Pixel Play (and Portable) include any games? 
Answer: Yes, it will include some freeware games and to fully utilize its power and to play your old favourites, you should follow the instructions found on this link.

Can more games be pre-loaded into the console? 
Answer: The console will come pre-loaded with a few shareware games. To get more games, follow this link. To find out how to transfer the ROMs/games to the console, follow this link.

Where do I get more games?
Answer: Games (also known as ROMs) can be easily found on the Internet. Just google "Download MAME ROMs" or go to this site.

What are the dimensions of Pixel Play Arcade? 
Answer: It is 280.0mm (W) x 280.0mm (D) x 350.0mm (H) (11'' x 11'' x 13.8'').  It is meant to be a desktop version.  

What are the dimensions of the 3PA housing unit?
Answer: It is approximately 95.0mm (L) x 65.0mm (W) x 30.0mm (H) (3.74" x 2.56" x 1.18").  It is meant to bring around! 

What is the dimensions of Pixel Play Portable 8Bitdo Bluetooth Controller? 
Answer: It is approximately 75.0mm (W) x 40.0mm (D) x 15.0mm (H) (2.95" x 1.57" x 0.59").  It is meant to bring around!

Why is Pixel Play Portable and the 8Bitdo Bluetooth Controller SO SMALL!?
Answer: The housing and the controller are meant to be small so that you can easily fit everything into your pocket and bring it around to your friend's house or when you are traveling.

What color is the Pixel Play?
Answer: Dark wood veneer.

Is the postage included with the pricing?
Answer: No, Postage will be charge separately according where you are and how fast you want it. I will try to ship it by the cheapest possible option.

What if I have problem with my console?
Answer: Do check all the FAQ or write to me at hengtoo@gmail.com.  I have left several of my console running for more than a year and there never had any hardware failure.  Either way, I'll try to help you to troubleshoot.

What voltage does Pixel Play or 3PA power off?
Answer: It can be plug into 110V or 240V. 

I mess up on the settings or accidentally erase my SD card... HELP?
Answer: What you need to do it to reformat your SD card and then reburn the image onto the card.  Click here and follow the instructions shown on the page. 

What are the title of the freeware games that you mentioned?
Answer: A couple of popular games like pac-man, galaxian, dig-dug, etc.

Aren't those games a violation of copy-rights? 
Answer: According to this site dated 2015-03-31, and a paragraph taken from their site:

"Japanese financial news source Nikkei reported on Tuesday that Bandai Namco Games is opening up the rights to 17 of their older video game properties. By making the rights available for use, the company hopes to revive interest in the properties."



The Impact

Everywhere I go, I've received the same request: Can I build one for them? Whether it is wives buying for their husbands, or kids for their dads, or dads for their kids, it is the same: Can I deliver it soon? I feel so bad when I tell them that I am limited in production capacity, and that they'll likely only get theirs sometime next year.


Risks & Challenges

Even if I'm not able to raise the full amount, I'll still be able to fulfill your orders, except that I'll take quite a lot longer to get it to you. There is little risk to the completion of the design, as I already have a production model up and running.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help me get the word out and let your friends know about this.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools, FB, email, whatever!
story_txt:
Intro
As a child of the 70s and 80s, the single-most happy childhood memory I have is the endless hours spent in the arcade with my brother. These days, every time we meet and re-count our growing up years, I yearn to re-create and re-capture those moments when the simple pleasures were about achieving top ranking on the High Score list of Pac-Man and Space Invaders. 
I want to bring back the good ol' days and just be able to chill out with my brother once again and introduce the wonder of arcade games to my daughter.
I’m a "tinker-er" by nature, and love to take things apart and build stuff just for the heck of it. I used to do this late at night due to my day job. More recently, I quit my day job to try tinkering full-time!

My First Pixel Play Arcade Prototype
Based on M.A.M.E. (Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator) that I tinkered with way back in 2000, I set out in late 2014 to build a home arcade system that could play all the classic video games. After much research and trial-and-error, I built the first prototype out of vanguard sheets (paper!). 












Starting Point: 1st Prototype made out of vanguard sheet




My first order of business when I started out with the vanguard sheet prototype was to source for the parts and then model the housing using Google's Sketchup 3D program. I then had to figure out how I was going to actually build the housing.

Building My First Production Pixel Play Arcade
The building of the housing evolved over time. I first decided that the most cost-effective method was to CNC-cut the material (essentially using a computer to control the cutting tool) rather that to mill by hand. The problem was that I didn't have access to any tools. So I decided to build my own. I started with a wooden version CNC router. It wasn’t pretty and neither was the cut for the housing. But it was a crucial first step towards my goal.

I then decided to build a "proper" CNC milling machine (I called it the Ox). While it worked a lot better, I was still not happy with the finishing, and the edges were rough and needed to be sanded down.  My final solution was found when I chanced upon a 60 watt laser cutter and I decided to try to laser-cut my housing.  Needless to say, it was voila and since then, I never looked back.




 

 

 


(Left to Right): 1st CNC routing machine built on my kitchen table; proper CNC routing machine named “Ox”; finally my laser-cutter solution.




When I finally built Pixel Play Arcade, I did not realize the significance of what I had done until I showed it to my friends. It brought back so many memories for them (they're kinda in my generation) and the Pixel Play Arcade became the talk of every party. Another surprising thing happened: our kids began to play with it too. There was instant connection across the generations and I've not seen parents and kids have fun like this in a long time: everyone was a kid in the room!
I soon started to get "orders" to produce Pixel Play Arcade for my friends. Even acquaintances and colleagues began to ask me to build it for them. It was then that I understood that this project had great potential to bring joy to so many people. 








The final finished product... Pixel Play Arcade




Why I Need Your Help
With my home-made tools, my current rate of production is about 1 per week. I estimate that with practice, I might be able to bring that down a little, but not much more. To fulfil the backlog of orders quickly (many would like me to do this by Christmas. Yikes!), I need better tools to increase my rate of production. I figured I need the following:

With the new machines, I am able to produce at a rate of 2 per day. That's more than a 10-fold increase in the production rate. With this capacity, I'll be able to fulfil orders at a much higher rate!
BUT... that's not all. Even as I am fulfilling this dream, I'm already dreaming up a  2-player Pixel Play Arcade. This is the other reason why I need better tools, especially the 4'x8' laser cutter. I have built a wood prototype of the 2-player arcade but because of the size limitation of my current laser cutter, I am not able to go much bigger. This prototype is hand-milled, which is not only painfully time consuming but also not well finished. I also built a "proof-of-concept" demonstrator using metal extrusion as a frame. I need your help to fulfil my dream!

With ThePokemonFactory.com guarantee 

- Over 1,500 unique visitors per day
- More than 400 accounts sold each month
- 0% of banned accounts

All contributors will have exclusive access to our Discord channel and our Skype for all questions and suggestions.

ThePokemonFactory.com is the one and only company that currently sells Pokemon Go accounts levels 39 and 40, for us it was easy to realize that to reach these levels safely we had to meet these 3 requirements:
- Manual work, forget about bots that will mark your accounts forever, with our Technology owning "Physical Bot", we guarantee that our accounts are created humane and always using Pokemon Go App.
- Security, we have a network of private VPNs that allow us to make incursions in any location.
- Patience, nobody plays 24h a day 7 days a week, we give a rigorous calendar to the account to normalize the creation process.

Although initially our business was directed towards the sale of accounts and alternative services (farming, Catching ...) we have always thought that uninterrupted service to the customer was the only option to be able to guarantee a perfect service for the client.

With a limited number of accounts, and for a limited time, we will create the best accounts in the market with an incredible service:

- Permanent update: every time new Pokemon appear, our customers turn to us to capture and add to their account. Obviously this has a high cost. For this reason you can rest easy, every time there are new additions to Pokemon Go, we will capture them for you, FREE !!.
How does it work?
When we detect that there are new Pokemon Go, following a rigorous schedule, we will contact you to set a date of capture. You forget everything, we capture your Pokemon and you can continue enjoying the account.

- Anti Ban Guarantee: Only we can guarantee this, our processes of creation are legitimate, rigorous and we never use Bots or Apps of third parties. However you can be even more calm, since if your account is banned for any reason (not covered by the use of bots) we will replace it with an account just like yours

We have everything ready, we only miss you.

These are our wonderful accounts

Level 40 Account

As the creation process is long, all buyers will send them the first day they make the purchase a “The Gym Crusher Level 37”, so you can enjoy until you have your Level 40 account for an incredible account. TOTALLY FREE

IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT OUR CREATION PROCESS


The main objective when creating this type of accounts is security.

We have taken care of all phases of creation just like in the rest of our accounts, but the final phase especially the last steps up to the level change we have done totally manually.

We have loaded the count of lucky eggs, we have loaded it on a smartphone and using the lucky eggs, next to an official device Pokemon Go Plus we have traveled dozens of Km in areas full of PokepStops and Pokemon.

It is a very laborious job, but this guarantees us to give a real human treatment to the account and not put at risk an account of such a high level.

All the final evolutions and discards are always made from a Smartphone with the official Pokemon Go App.

All Sniping has been done manually, with smartphone equipped with VPN from the target zone and always using the Official Pokemon GO App.
story_txt:
With ThePokemonFactory.com guarantee 
- Over 1,500 unique visitors per day- More than 400 accounts sold each month- 0% of banned accounts
All contributors will have exclusive access to our Discord channel and our Skype for all questions and suggestions.
ThePokemonFactory.com is the one and only company that currently sells Pokemon Go accounts levels 39 and 40, for us it was easy to realize that to reach these levels safely we had to meet these 3 requirements:- Manual work, forget about bots that will mark your accounts forever, with our Technology owning "Physical Bot", we guarantee that our accounts are created humane and always using Pokemon Go App.- Security, we have a network of private VPNs that allow us to make incursions in any location.- Patience, nobody plays 24h a day 7 days a week, we give a rigorous calendar to the account to normalize the creation process.
Although initially our business was directed towards the sale of accounts and alternative services (farming, Catching ...) we have always thought that uninterrupted service to the customer was the only option to be able to guarantee a perfect service for the client.
With a limited number of accounts, and for a limited time, we will create the best accounts in the market with an incredible service:
- Permanent update: every time new Pokemon appear, our customers turn to us to capture and add to their account. Obviously this has a high cost. For this reason you can rest easy, every time there are new additions to Pokemon Go, we will capture them for you, FREE !!.How does it work?When we detect that there are new Pokemon Go, following a rigorous schedule, we will contact you to set a date of capture. You forget everything, we capture your Pokemon and you can continue enjoying the account.
- Anti Ban Guarantee: Only we can guarantee this, our processes of creation are legitimate, rigorous and we never use Bots or Apps of third parties. However you can be even more calm, since if your account is banned for any reason (not covered by the use of bots) we will replace it with an account just like yours
We have everything ready, we only miss you.
These are our wonderful accounts
Level 40 Account

As the creation process is long, all buyers will send them the first day they make the purchase a “The Gym Crusher Level 37”, so you can enjoy until you have your Level 40 account for an incredible account. TOTALLY FREE
Although the accounts have very similar characteristics, the initial basic characteristics are as follows:– Object Bag update to 1000– Pokemon Bag update to 1000– Fullpokedex Gen 1 IV100– Fullpokedex Gen 2 (80% IV100)– Baby Pokemon 5-7 diferent– 500 Pokemon IV100– The bigger collection in the world of (Dragonite, Lapras, Gyarados, Snorlax, Charizard, Blastoise, Venusaur, Vaporeon) All with Hight IV & CP + 180 of this Gen 2 Rares & Ultra rares Pokemon– +800 Pokemon in the Bag– Tons of candies, this is the sample of minimum:– Dratini – +5.000 Candies– Bulbasaur – +1,000 Candies– Ditto – +550 Candies– Charmander – +1,000 Candies– Squirtle – +2,100 Candies– Snorlax – +2000 Candies– Lapras – +300 Candies– Eevee – +1.500 Candies– Tons of Gen 2 Candies (Working in real data)
+4.700.000 Stardust
Of course

Level 40 Account - 40 Days after purchase reward (Free account Level 37 - 24Hours)
 
IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT OUR CREATION PROCESS
The main objective when creating this type of accounts is security.
We have taken care of all phases of creation just like in the rest of our accounts, but the final phase especially the last steps up to the level change we have done totally manually.
We have loaded the count of lucky eggs, we have loaded it on a smartphone and using the lucky eggs, next to an official device Pokemon Go Plus we have traveled dozens of Km in areas full of PokepStops and Pokemon.
It is a very laborious job, but this guarantees us to give a real human treatment to the account and not put at risk an account of such a high level.
All the final evolutions and discards are always made from a Smartphone with the official Pokemon Go App.
All Sniping has been done manually, with smartphone equipped with VPN from the target zone and always using the Official Pokemon GO App.

story:
• Gunslinger is the old west style duels simulator game.
  • Become a Gunslinger searching for bounties on the heads of other Gunslingers.
  • Your phone becomes your gun, your friends become your foes.
  • The more you win the more your head is worth.

 

 

The Android version is now available on Google Play! Get it here:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.softnstuff.gunslinger

 

One of the main reasons for this campaign is to ask for your support to be able to finish the iOS version and publish it in the App Store.

 

Gunslinger is played between two people who use their phones as if they were their weapons.

Each Gunslinger has a reward on its head, which increases the longer it plays.
To play you must challenge another Gunslinger. They put themselves in position, prepare their weapons to draw, wait for the signal, aim and fire.

 

The fastest and most precise wins the duel and claims the reward.

With the money you earn you can buy more weapons, bullets and accessories.

 

Like any startup, we need resources to bring ideas to reality.

We developed the initial version of Gunslinger in our free time and with our own resources.
The original idea came about 3 years ago but it was until now that we were able to release the first version on Google Play. We believe this project has a lot of potential to become a really fun game to play with your friends.

You can help us speed up this project and make our vision of Gunslinger a reality :)

 

With your support we will not only develop the iOS version, we will also be able to add more content to the game, more weapons, more items, and new game modes, such as...

  • Single player mode using Augmented Reality.
 
  • Customizable virtual avatars.
 
  • A mode where other Gunslingers can challenge your avatar even if you're not playing.
 
  • A faction-based team system.
 
  • Duel mode of 3 Gunslingers, also known as Mexican-Standoff.
 
  • Bounty hunt mode based on geolocation.

 

We have different rewards ready for you, choose the one you like and support us.

 

We are a group of friends who met in college. One day, while having a beer we said, "what if... we make a video game?" And just like that Soft 'n' Stuff was born, an independent studio driven by our ideas and creativity.

 

Making a video game always involves bringing together a multidisciplinary team: designers, artists, animators, programmers and administrators. All working together so that the game can live.

Success without the necessary resources is complicated, but we are confident that we will make it. We were able to release the Android version and now with your support we will finish the iOS version and will implement several improvements to the game. The resources we gather will be put to good use.

 

Do you have a blog, podcast or YouTube channel? Do you want to talk about us? We are more than happy to help you, contact us to send you a press kit and give you the help you need.

 

Can't donate? No problem! You can still help us.
Share this campaign on your social networks, with your family and friends and if you have Android you can download Gunslinger from Google Play, in this way you would be helping us enormously :)

story:
Event Details:

Venue        : University of Michigan, Ann Arbor

Date           : May 22nd-24th, 2015 (Friday-Sunday)

Visit our website and find out more here!

Overview

The Malaysia Midwest Games is an annual sporting event that gathers more than 1000 Malaysians across the United States and Canada. This year, the Malaysian Students' Association (MiMSA) at the University of Michigan with the support from Ministry of Education Malaysia and Education Malaysia Chicago (EMC) has been given the privilege to become the host. The objective of the games is to foster relationships between Malaysian students from different universities in the Unites States and to cultivate the spirit of sportsmanship among them. Participants will compete in team and individual sports, including men's and women's soccer, basketball, tennis and volleyball. Less common sports include badminton, netball and takraw. Although our participation is restricted to Malaysians, we welcome non-Malaysians to be part of the audience.

story:
How many people are playing multiplayer video games constantly sitting home in front of screen?




We got better idea!  

We'll bring the game in your real life and give you real friends and zombies! Or brains and friends... It's up to you :)


Let's shoot some zombies on the street of your city! 

Or... You can be a zombie and find some sweet brains in your neighborhood... Why not? :)




Good news!

There is a new world called ZombieON and it's right here around you, you just can't see it because you have no ZombieON game application installed on your mobile device... but for now the game is on early development stage, that's why we need your help to make it happen.


WHY CROWDFUNDING ?


Only with your help we'll be able to complete the game development and ZombieON will be available in AppStore and Google play! 


   1. Once the game is ready you'll need just to install ZombieON on your mobile device (iOS or Android), sign in or register, customize your hero, turn on geolocation on your device and you are inside ZombieON world! 

   2. You'll see yourself (your hero) on the real map of your region in gameplay. 

   3. You'll be alerted once there are zombies or humans (if you are zombie) around you (~100m), and they will be alerted as well ... so you'll have to decide really quick to run away by foot or in your car ... or fight in graphic interface on your mobile device and show them what you got!



Just imagine yourself chasing someone on the street with the map navigation because you want some sweet brains! :)



It'll definitely help you to meet new friends in real life while they are in the game because the game is EVERYWHERE! 

   * internal messenger is included.


You can choose to be a zombie or a human. But if you got beaten by zombie you'll become a zombie unless you got a cure in your bag! You can buy cures, antidotes, weapons and other items in ZombieON store or just be the first to find it on real location in your city for free or take it away from the enemy, but it won't be easy! You also can exchange items with your teammates.




We'll make you run crazy because zombies are coming for you! :)


For now the game (for iOS and Android) is on early development stage and needs lot of your help to make it just as great as we wanted. 

All your contributions will be personalized and converted to ZombieON coins, you'll get it on your ZombieON account once the game is online, just provide us with your email address while donating. It'll help you to buy weapons, cures, antidotes, etc for your hero in ZombieON store.


Build zombie or human team with your friends and go get some fun! The game is going to be free and online all over the globe. Global ZombieON is coming. You better get ready now!



Only now you have a chance to get unique additional packages along with ZombieON coins (JUST SELECT A PERK)

Please make contribution and help us to start the real zombie apocalypse! :)


   * we are experienced team of mobile games developers and designers.


All your contributions will be personalized and converted to ZombieON coins, you'll get it on your ZombieON account once the game is online, just provide us with your email address while donating.


Thank you for your help and support in creation of ZombieON world :)


We will keep you informed of developments:




Next generation multiplayer game you've been waiting for is coming!


Share the campaign with everyone you know!

Remember, this is not just restricted to email, you can share on Twitter and Facebook too. Don’t be afraid of annoying friends and family... You'll have a chance to bite and turn all of them into zombies!

story:
Aspen is an upcoming visual novel made by Koimarina Games. The story is written keeping a great love of dating sims, sci-fi, and superheroes in mind! Taking down the big bad is an exhausted trope throughout comics, so Aspen has a heavier focus on the characters involved in the story. Getting to know them, improving their lives by reminding them that it isn't all about the usual villain attacks. Sometimes, it can be as simple but as important as just being their best friend.

Download our demo on itch.io!

More might be added over time, however if we get past this much we'll most likely just set the money aside to fund future projects or further improve Aspen itself in other ways.

Some additional routes may be released later down the line or little extra tidbits to really add some flavor to the game to help it stand out from other visual novels.

Of course, with every crowdfunding campaign there are going to be special rewards for anyone that chooses to fund us! While you can start off as small as $1 USD, here are the rewards you can receive later down the line!

At Mutter, your pre-order is set in stone! Contributors will get a digital copy of Aspen either through Steam or Itch.io if there's ever any hitches with publishing on Steam!

Stage Whisper tier contributors donate $20 and receive a copy of the game as well as cellphone backgrounds illustrated by Scarletify on Twitter!

Speakers will receive all of the previous rewards as well as a digital copy of the official art book! We don't have a cover drafted for it yet, but we do know it will feature sketches of older designs, older sprites, and tons of info about the world building and characters that isn't shown in the game! Really, even though we're calling it an art book it's probably more accurate to call it a compendium.

As well as that beefy art book, the game, and the backgrounds, Announce tier contributors will also get some buttons delivered to them! Keep in mind, you may have to pay a little bit extra to cover shipping, but you'll get some adorable buttons drawn by strwbrrypirates on Twitter!

Contributors that reach the Bellow tier will receive all of the past rewards as well as three charms of our main boys drawn by our lovely background artist, witchpastel!

Just like Shriek, contributing this much clearly means you want it all! Contributing $100 USD will earn you the game, backgrounds, art book, buttons, charms, and a beautiful poster also drawn by witchpastel! This package won't be very heavy, but it will be a little wide in order to preserve the paper this print comes in!

Every member of our team is currently attending college, be it part-time or full-time. Because of this, there is a chance that our currently estimated release date isn't entirely accurate. While we're dedicated to getting Aspen done, a proper education is still important to all of us. No matter what, we will get this finished. It just might take a bit of time.

This is also everyone's first big project. We are taking great care to ensure that Aspen is the best it can be, but as amateurs flaws can be expected.

We appreciate your help with the game, and be sure to follow our Twitter to get updates!

We're hoping to release Aspen some time in 2020, and depending on how much we make from our campaign we just might speed up the process!

story:
Game-play Overview

PitterPot is a 3D platforming game! In this game you play as PitterPot, a potted plant who was brought to life by a wizard who loves to garden. He did not realize however that other plants would also come to life. Evil weeds and new creatures destroyed the garden the wizard loved so much. PitterPot who is massively loyal decides to take it upon himself to fix the tragedy that he himself, feel he partially caused. You must travel the world collecting seeds of various and rare plants to rebuild and restore your garden to its former glory and beyond! You are also on a mission to fight and destroy the evil vines and creatures who started this mess.

  • 3D platforming, jumping, running, combat.
  • Many unique worlds to explore.
  • Collect-a-ton styled in some ways, many little seeds to collect, along with much more important items and rare seeds.

*This is game is planned to release in the United States, Mexico, Brazil, Canada, and possibly the PEGI regions of Europe.(If funding does not exceed 3,000 then Europe will be excluded) If you do not live in one of these intended regions, it is probably safer not to donate to get a copy of the game, as it may never make it into your region.

*All physical rewards are only shipped to areas within the United States, if you live outside of this area, please do not select a physical reward, as you will not receive it, thank you.

New Videos Added



Multiplayer

This game has a Co-Op Mode planned. Currently we are planning on adding a Co-Op mode where two players can play together. One person will play on the Wii U GamePad while the other plays on the TV screen. More info to come.

The Funds

This game is partially being funded from revenue earned on TreeFall's past projects. However, it is not nearly enough. We need around 6,500 dollars to finish paying our new employees, and pay all necessary fees in order to ensure this project lives up to its full potential. 

Development Updates

We are in early development now. As you can see the first level we have shown off looks really complete, although more changes are certainly to come. We will provide weekly updates with this game as we did with Maze and the Developer Commentary series! You might have noticed only one world style was shown, we have planned out the rest of the game, and started working on more levels, however they are not ready to be shown off just yet. With some more funds and a week or two, we will try to bring you a more diverse look at this game. We feel that this first world has been put together very well however and is more than enough to get you excited for this game!

PitterPot


Risks & Challenges

We face many challenges and there are risks in everything. We certainly started off in the negative spotlight with our title, The Letter. We have started overcoming the overwhelming negativity however with Maze, and remaining positive. People have seen a massive improvement in our development skills with our second title, and we only aim to continue to improve. If negativity from our past tries to bring the project down, we will continue moving forward as we always have, and remain positive and uplifting all the while. 

  • We have launched multiple games already on Nintendo's platform, we are qualified to bring you a new experience.
  • Even when massive hatred has poured in the past, we look for the positives and keep improving each time.

Sharing.

If you liked this campaign, or this brief glimpse at this soon to be massive game, please share it on Social Media or with your friends! It will be a huge help!

Game-play Overview PitterPot is a 3D platforming game! In this game you play as PitterPot, a potted plant who was brought to life by a wizard who loves to garden. He did not realize however that other plants would also come to life. Evil weeds and new creatures destroyed the garden the wizard loved so much. PitterPot who is massively loyal decides to take it upon himself to fix the tragedy that he himself, feel he partially caused. You must travel the world collecting seeds of various and rare plants to rebuild and restore your garden to its former glory and beyond! You are also on a mission to fight and destroy the evil vines and creatures who started this mess.  3D platforming, jumping, running, combat. Many unique worlds to explore. Collect-a-ton styled in some ways, many little seeds to collect, along with much more important items and rare seeds.  
*This is game is planned to release in the United States, Mexico, Brazil, Canada, and possibly the PEGI regions of Europe.(If funding does not exceed 3,000 then Europe will be excluded) If you do not live in one of these intended regions, it is probably safer not to donate to get a copy of the game, as it may never make it into your region.
*All physical rewards are only shipped to areas within the United States, if you live outside of this area, please do not select a physical reward, as you will not receive it, thank you.
New Videos Added





   Multiplayer This game has a Co-Op Mode planned. Currently we are planning on adding a Co-Op mode where two players can play together. One person will play on the Wii U GamePad while the other plays on the TV screen. More info to come.   The Funds This game is partially being funded from revenue earned on TreeFall's past projects. However, it is not nearly enough. We need around 6,500 dollars to finish paying our new employees, and pay all necessary fees in order to ensure this project lives up to its full potential. 
Development Updates
We are in early development now. As you can see the first level we have shown off looks really complete, although more changes are certainly to come. We will provide weekly updates with this game as we did with Maze and the Developer Commentary series! You might have noticed only one world style was shown, we have planned out the rest of the game, and started working on more levels, however they are not ready to be shown off just yet. With some more funds and a week or two, we will try to bring you a more diverse look at this game. We feel that this first world has been put together very well however and is more than enough to get you excited for this game!
PitterPot



   Risks & Challenges We face many challenges and there are risks in everything. We certainly started off in the negative spotlight with our title, The Letter. We have started overcoming the overwhelming negativity however with Maze, and remaining positive. People have seen a massive improvement in our development skills with our second title, and we only aim to continue to improve. If negativity from our past tries to bring the project down, we will continue moving forward as we always have, and remain positive and uplifting all the while.   We have launched multiple games already on Nintendo's platform, we are qualified to bring you a new experience. Even when massive hatred has poured in the past, we look for the positives and keep improving each time.    Sharing.
If you liked this campaign, or this brief glimpse at this soon to be massive game, please share it on Social Media or with your friends! It will be a huge help!

story:
Overview

Luminous is a true sandbox, a post-apocalyptic game where the player will reside in northern California and earth has been hit by a moon-sized asteroid. Players will have to fight off mutant creatures ranging from zombies, to cave dwellers. Players will need to also fight off players and fortify pre-existing buildings to survive. They will have to supply it with water, electricity, etc. How will you survive the apocalypse? You can play Luminous with Friends or go in solo.

"How would I survive a world-ending situation?"

 

It's a question you've probably asked yourself, and it's a question we will help you answer.

Luminous is a crowd-funded game aimed to be the perfect open-world survival game that will satisfy any gamer's needs. Initially started in December of 2018, we have been hard at work ever since making the next big survival title.

Luminous caters to a multitude of survival playstyles that can be mixed and matched, affording players an infinite amount of ways to survive in post-apocalyptic California. We plan to be the most advanced game with physics, health, and much, much more.

We've been hard at work over the past 2 years to bring Luminous to your PCs. We have finally layed out a foundation to where we are comfortable with creating campaigns and community discords.

*DISCLAIMER*
Before you continue we would like to point out SOME of what you see may be placeholder assets until we get more funds.
 

LOOK HOW YOU WANT

The way you like it.



In Luminous, you will be able to customize every aspect of your character ranging from hair length to your package. There are no limits in Luminous to how you can look. We want everyone to have their own unique look instead of having a bunch of the same models running around
 

The world of Luminous is filled to the brim with every type of weapon you could think of, and we've built them from the ground up to support all kinds of customization, you will be able to make your own homemade suppressors and even sights. If you even wanted, you could rig a kitchen timer up to some cans, rocks, and gunpowder to make a C4! Weapons will also have dynamic damage to them, for example, your gun will wear over time and will need to eventually replace things like the trigger, hammer, etc.

 

You can also use scraps such as old lawnmowers, fire extinguishers, pressure washers, and more to put together weapons, ensuring your survival no matter the situation. Shit, you could even combine a Molotov with a spear to make a throwable fire spear!

It doesn't stop with the weapons. We have also built our vehicles from the ground up and just like the weapons, they are fully customizable. You will be able to attach a ram bar to a go-cart if you really wanted to. Once again, just like the weapons, vehicles will have dynamic damage and will eventually need to replace things like the radiator, ignition plugs, etc.

 

You can also turn your vehicle into a mobile fortress, or have a truck configured to tow a few thousand liters of fuel, water, or even tow a wrecked vehicle. It's all up to you in the world of Luminous.

 

MULTIPLAYER

Hell on Earth. Better with friends.

Luminous was thought and developed, from the beginning, by friends and devs alike. We plan to support and encourage both playstyles as often as we can and wherever we can.

Whether you want to join an official community server, or a player made server, you will be able to play with all of your friends, because let's be real, every game is better with friends. Keep in mind a single-player option will also be available.


OUR WORLD

32x32km of the beautiful burning landscape.

We have made our environment to be as diverse as possible. From rocky hills to grassy plains there will always be something new to explore.

IMMERSIVE INVENTORY

Minimal HUD elements. Maximum attention to detail.

Luminous utilizes a grid-based, jigsaw-style inventory system kinda like Escape from Tarkov that challenges you to plan and conserve. Just as in real life, you will be able to put items inside of things like bags, etc.

Our items are designed to behave realistically. You'll have to unbox your ammo and pack your magazines, open cans of food with various tools that can be found in the world - or simply smash it on the ground if nothing else is available.

All of our actions in Luminous will have custom animations ranging from turning on a light, to ripping a zombie's head off.

RESOURCES

Essential to living.
PICTURE COMING SOON

Electricity is a massive part of today's society. The same goes with Luminous. Once you claim a house, you will be tasked with providing it with electricity, water, etc. Electricity and water will be available in a variety of ways, it is up to you to figure out how to provide and keep yourself alive and not 6 feet under.
 

OUR COMMUNITY

Essential to our success!

Luminous is community-driven and won't be anything without our community! We will continue to provide helpful resources and accept suggestions. We will listen to our community. We believe what makes a bad game is a team of devs that don't listen to their community.

 

STRETCH GOAL PROGRESS​

We love progress!

From here on out you will find out goals that we would like to reach, it is not essential, but it would provide more things to do within the world of Luminous.

 

PLANES & TRAINS


 

Just like every other thing in Luminous, if we reach this goal, the planes and trains will be made from the ground up and will support customizations. You will be able to swap out propellers/bells for trains and planes, you will at one point be able to build your own railroad track if you gather enough resources.

Required Amount: $1,000 USD - NOT REACHED

 

INTERACTIVE AI SETTLEMENTS & FACTIONS

 

If we do reach this goal, we plan to add in dynamic AI settlements and whatnot around the world that will be procedurally generated for each server so no experience is the same. We want to play our game with you guys so replayability is a very important aspect to us.

Required Amount: $2,000 USD - NOT REACHED
 

RADIO & RADIO STATIONS

 

If we do reach this goal, there will be radios and radio stations around our world that will act as modes of communication and so on, we plan to even add a feature where you can intercept one's radio transmissions and listen to other people talk over radios to gather info.

Required Amount: $3,000 USD - NOT REACHED

MORE GOALS PLANNED!

 

WHAT WOULD YOU DO IN A WORLD-ENDING SITUATION?

To be quite honest, I would probably just off myself.

We are making this game whether we receive funds or not, we are dedicated to this game and will work 10 jobs if we have to, to provide for this game and get it into the hands of the PC community.


Check out our Discord for more information!

Follow us on Twitter for frequent updates!

Subscribe to our channel on YouTube!

Check out our Instagram!
 

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

We have modeled our system requirements based on the Unreal Engine 4 recommended specifications. They are subject to change based on further development.

Desktop PC

Windows 7 64-bit or later.

Six-Core Intel Processor or AMD processor, 3.5 GHz or faster.

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.

16 GB RAM.
 

Let us know if you think this campaign contains prohibited content.

story:
Information on "Select a Perk"

Make sure that you click on the image in the description of the perk to see the complete details of everything that is included with that particular level and all the benefits that you will receive.

 

The Game

Planet Ants is a brand new and unique online game that comprises an innovative networked and interconnected "social media" game that is played on smartphones either at home or, when permitted, whilst out and about travelling and on the move. The concept is very different to other games using GPS and location technology (for example, “Pokémon GO”) and players will have the advantage to enjoy the many distinct and divergent features and benefits that Planet Ant offers.

The basic idea and concept of the game is for the player to create and then determine the fate and destiny of an ant colony. Players have to feed, enlarge, protect and defend the colony and at the same time also protect, defend and continuously expand the territory that belongs to their own nest. A group of roaming ants is always on the move to gather supplies, form new nests, enlarge the colony and expand the territory.

One of the main aspects of the game and the key to what makes it so different and special from other games is the use of the existing GPS function that is installed on all smartphones and the fact that the player has the ability to use their current geographical location to communicate with their allies and friends. Eventually, this aspect will become even more important as the game develops and battles are introduced so that the colony will be in a position to launch raids on a predatory basis and gain food and territory if they are successful.

An additional and important part of the game is the inclusion of an in-game premium currency called “DITS” that will provide a better gaming experience. All perks include discounts and/or rewards of DITS!

Planet Ants is and will always be a free-to-play game and there will never be a cost for the App. It will never be possible to buy your way to success and the game will always be based on skill and dedication. The use of DITS is only for certain enhancements and is explained fully in the FAQ section.

                                                                       

This is not just a game!

Never before have players had a chance to be a part of a real-life ant world in real time. Who will be the ultimate Queen of the Ant Kingdom? Whose alliance will be the strongest? Who will have the largest and most successful ant colony? Who will then be ready to take on the rest of the ant world? Who will become invincible!?

 

 

Introduction

We are Planet Ants, an English company with Swiss shareholders. We have a vision – to bring a unique and exciting smartphone game to the market.

We have researched and developed something that is unique and that will change the world of gaming. We are passionate and completely focused on realising a successful Indiegogo campaign to enable us to give gamers the game that they have been waiting for.

The infrastructure is there, the extremely complicated game design and structure is complete, the initial graphics are ready and there is a pre-agreement with a leading gaming software developer.

Contributors to our campaign will effectively be an integral part of a new episode in the world of gaming and will be able to justifiably say that they were instrumental in ensuring that Planet Ants conquers the market. Everyone who contributes will be a valued member of the Planet Ants world and community.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need £ 15,000 to be able to conclude an agreement with a leading game software developer to get the first phase of Planet Ants out and onto the market. In this first phase, players will establish and build their colony and have several options for individual design and to prepare for future game phases and strategies. We guarantee that every single pence (or cent!) of that amount will be used only for this!

We can also guarantee that if we raise more than our original target, game phases 2 and 3 will be developed and released at the same time. These phases will concentrate on expanding the colony, building defence structures and strategies and preparing for roaming expeditions.

There will be an ongoing development programme with the release of additional game phases and levels to include building alliances, launching patrols with eventual battlefield operations as soon as possible.

As you see, we have released a quite amazing range of perks that reward our backers in an almost unbelievable way - based on levels of commitment and the principle that the more you can pledge, the more benefits you receive on an exponential basis. Early Birds will get even more!

                                                              

 

The Impact

We would expect most contributors to be active gamers and the range of perks reflect that by offering significant in-game and other benefits. We are sure that the possibility to be an integral part of the Planet Ants world will also be attractive and that everyone will be proud to be able to say that they were there right at the start.

As an added bonus, we also have something for non-gamers and have created a unique perk – the “Gift Voucher” – an excellent value option designed as a great way to give a present to family and friends who are gamers.

The Planet Ants team consists of a small core of people who have had a varied and always successful track record in the business world and have the necessary talents and abilities to bring the unique smartphone game that they have developed to the market. Their goal is to provide something different, something unique, something that gamers have been waiting for and will want to play.

We are real people and we will always be there for you. We believe that Planet Ants will indeed change the world of gaming. We believe that gamers will want to be a part of Planet Ants and that, most importantly, the game will change their lives and give them social mobility, the ability to meet new friends and, perhaps, most of all, enjoy a great game with a real purpose.

 

Ways You Can Help

It would be really great if you can be a part of our campaign.

But we appreciate that not everyone will be in a position to be able to contribute financially to our Indiegogo campaign. However, you can share with your friends and social media contacts and still consider yourself a part of the project.

Also remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Risks & Challenges

We know that any crowdfunding campaign can be considered a risk and that a successful outcome is never guaranteed. But, Planet Ants have already come a long way and invested significantly to get to this stage and the team are more than confident that the Planet Ants game will be launched and that we will receive sufficient backing and support to enable us to succeed.

We have so far dealt successfully with any challenges that we have faced and know that we can also deal successfully with any challenges in the future.

Also remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
