We have so far dealt successfully with any challenges that we have faced and know that we can also deal successfully with any challenges in the future.

story:
Escape from Earth is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle platformer. Your endearing alien character from the Planet Dyeog's normal day of delivering experimental space creatures has been turned upside down by mechanical errors on their ship. You find yourself hurling off course crashing onto planet Earth. You must collect coins and gems to fix your ship to return to Dyeog. You will come across many of the strange and sometimes dangerous experimental creatures that have fallen from your ships cargo. Good luck on your quest, Dyeogian. This is the style of game you would sit down to play for a couple of minutes and hours can pass by playing it.

 

 Stefan:

Why support this project? I was diagnosed as having semantic pragmatic disorder (part of the Autism spectrum) as a young child. I did struggle at school and after leaving I found myself getting more and more interested in game development. I worked on escape from earth with some friends. I was introduced to the Leeds advonet service who offered me a mentor, thanks to both the help and support of the service and the mentor I was able to move on more with the development of the game. My aim is now to prove that autism is not a barrier to achieving your dreams and goals. Please pledge and share now! 

 

Andrew:

I jumped into the project to help Stefan finish his game.  I started coding many years ago (back in the 80s) and writing games has always been a favourite. Every penny pledged will help us reach our final goal, and hopefully pass it with some awesome added features ;) 

 

You will have to collect the shiny gems and coins that have be scattered across all the levels.  Don't let this simple sounding premise fool you though, there are many enemies and puzzles along the way to slow you down. Trade coins and gems with the lovely earth people for weapons, health, or upgrade points, there's no knowing what the shop will have in stock.  You can also save your gems for the secret black market were you might get alien power ups or perhaps an upgraded weapon nobody knows about.

In-game features include:

  • Full game-pad support
  • Key Remapping
  • Multiple Aliens all with different ability and power ups
  • Puzzle levels
  • Adorable Aliens
  • Cartoon style graphics
  • Achievements
  • Hidden Secrets/Easter Eggs
  • Lot's more 
     

DarkNight-Studio is owned and run day to day by Stefan and team. Escape From Earth was  only possible with the help of Andy, Susana. So Andy and Susana have played a large part in escape from earth development. They both have moved on to other projects or work and uni and I still keep in contact Susana and catch up as we hope to work together. 

Update 2018

As of 2018 Escape From Earth is developed by Stefan & Andrew. Andrew joined the team to originally work on a different game which has now been put on hold so that Andrew can help me with escape from earth which has been a huge help and has sped up development.

Two other people have also helped with Escape From Earth. The first is Danicon Show "Dan" who helped with some menu graphics, and the second Nicole Marie T who has done the voice over for Escape From Earth as well as 2 music tracks for the game, and we hope to have her do more for the game as well as new sounds. Nicole I am very proud of as a friend because she has over come her shyness to do the voice over for me so thanks once again

 

We have a number of rewards to offer, included in these are escape from earth signed t-shirts and signed darknight-studio t shirts. Below you can see examples of the escape from earth posters, and the potential XBOX one case. There are also 4 e-postcards of different designs, 8 different escape from earth wallpapers. 

We have done a few test prints to perfect the size for cases as well as getting the size right for the download card that goes inside, with it's own scratch off silver section for the code. 

 

 

This is the second attempt at crowd funding this game, and since the last one I have learnt a lot about who to trust, and when. 

This time around we have some great support from people spreading the word, to streaming, and Youtube videos. 

With the main body of code already in place, the challenges should be fairly small, with mostly minor additions and tweaks.  As we go through the build process there will be updates to show how things are progressing. 

Like all projects there is some risks involved, however as we're keeping our sites on a game which is fun, enjoyable, and attractive to all rather than triple A title, this should help us keep the risks to a minimum. 

 

Below are some stretch goals we have set, if we go over the total we are trying to raise we will do some extra stuff for the game. The £15,000 stretch goal is unlocked this will give you an idea of we what have planned if we hit it.

 

£15,000: 

Professional Language Translation
Full Motion Video Animation (will replace are built in animation system at start of new game)

Android Support (android is planned but later down line if we hit this we will work on it as we do pc and xbox uwp builds)

£20,000: LOCKED

£25,000: LOCKED

£30,000: LOCKED

£35,000: LOCKED

 

Discord: Click Me

Twitter: Click Me

Instagram: Click Me

 

Click Image for demo

 

I have add this section, me Stefan, so i can say thank you to some people that have helped me a lot and supported me a lot.

 

I would like to see a huge thank you to Red Event Studios "Leon" for taking time out of his busy schedule to do the funding video and editing it and everything else for it. I would also like to thank Leon personal for all of his support as a friend and help me with some person stuff going on in my life. I have include some of his social media links about if you would like to check him out.

YouTube: Red Event Studios

 

I meet Ilona "IloSomnia" from a friends discord and have become very since as she has helped me grow my twitch channel form sharing to lurking and being a huge support to Escape From Earth asking about how development is doing and offering to play the game when it out and make video that i can use on the games story page as well. I have add Ilona twitch link below.

Twitch: IloSomnia

 

I meet Dogwisdom "Eric" throw a person call SamsterPlays as twitch streamer that i can't remember how i meet since then Dogwisdom and me have become very good friend and he has taken large interest in Escape From Earth promoting it on every single stream as well as promoting my channel that has given me a massive boost.  

Twitch: Dogwisdom
story_txt:
Escape from Earth is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle platformer. Your endearing alien character from the Planet Dyeog's normal day of delivering experimental space creatures has been turned upside down by mechanical errors on their ship. You find yourself hurling off course crashing onto planet Earth. You must collect coins and gems to fix your ship to return to Dyeog. You will come across many of the strange and sometimes dangerous experimental creatures that have fallen from your ships cargo. Good luck on your quest, Dyeogian. This is the style of game you would sit down to play for a couple of minutes and hours can pass by playing it.  Stefan:Why support this project? I was diagnosed as having semantic pragmatic disorder (part of the Autism spectrum) as a young child. I did struggle at school and after leaving I found myself getting more and more interested in game development. I worked on escape from earth with some friends. I was introduced to the Leeds advonet service who offered me a mentor, thanks to both the help and support of the service and the mentor I was able to move on more with the development of the game. My aim is now to prove that autism is not a barrier to achieving your dreams and goals. Please pledge and share now!  Andrew:I jumped into the project to help Stefan finish his game.  I started coding many years ago (back in the 80s) and writing games has always been a favourite. Every penny pledged will help us reach our final goal, and hopefully pass it with some awesome added features ;)  You will have to collect the shiny gems and coins that have be scattered across all the levels.  Don't let this simple sounding premise fool you though, there are many enemies and puzzles along the way to slow you down. Trade coins and gems with the lovely earth people for weapons, health, or upgrade points, there's no knowing what the shop will have in stock.  You can also save your gems for the secret black market were you might get alien power ups or perhaps an upgraded weapon nobody knows about.In-game features include:
Full game-pad support
Key Remapping
Multiple Aliens all with different ability and power ups
Puzzle levels
Adorable Aliens
Cartoon style graphics
Achievements
Hidden Secrets/Easter Eggs
Lot's more  
DarkNight-Studio is owned and run day to day by Stefan and team. Escape From Earth was  only possible with the help of Andy, Susana. So Andy and Susana have played a large part in escape from earth development. They both have moved on to other projects or work and uni and I still keep in contact Susana and catch up as we hope to work together. Update 2018As of 2018 Escape From Earth is developed by Stefan & Andrew. Andrew joined the team to originally work on a different game which has now been put on hold so that Andrew can help me with escape from earth which has been a huge help and has sped up development.Two other people have also helped with Escape From Earth. story:
Hallo ihr Lieben! :)

Vielleicht kennt ihr mich von YouTube her, vielleicht auch nicht. Dort bin ich bekannt als Onkel Morph und ich veröffentliche mit grösster Vorliebe Let's Play Videos. Schau doch mal rein :) -> https://www.youtube.com/user/morphszockerbude

Nun geht aber mein Notebook leider immer weiter in die Knie, sodass es mir oftmals gar nicht mehr möglich ist eine Aufnahme zu machen, ohne dass mein Rechner immer wieder abstürzt. Zudem dauert das Rendern der Videos sehr lange und die Qualität der jeweiligen Spiele ist leider auch nicht sehr beeindruckend, was mich irgendwo auch traurig macht, da ich nur zu gut weiss, wie sehr sich meine Zuschauer ein Let's Play zu bestimmten Spielen wünschen, oder dass sie eine oftmals miese Grafik aushalten müssen.

Für einen neuen PC fehlen mir leider die Mittel, da ich wenn schon ein Gerät kaufen möchte, womit ich auch Spiele aufnehmen kann, die höhere Anforderungen haben - wie beispielsweise Ark, GTA V, oder The Witcher.

Daher möchte ich euch bitten, ob ihr nicht vielleicht Lust hättet, mich bei diesem Vorhaben zu unterstützen? Es würde meiner Community und auch mir sehr viel Freude bereiten, zumal das Let's Playen mein liebstes Hobby ist!


Folgendes System habe ich zusammengestellt: https://goo.gl/ZTAzc5


Euer Onkel Morph

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/morphszockerbude
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/OnkelMorph
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OnkelMorph
Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/+morphszockerbude

story:
Disciples of the Storm is a unique RTS looking to reboot the game style mechanics of the old RTS, Netstorm Islands at War. Under a new game world, and IP, it seeks to bring the same style into 3D environment in a slowly expanding world.
Enter the world of Sonus, ruled by the powerful and fickle Tempest gods of Wind, Thunder, Rain, and Sun.
The world of Sonus is torn by powerful, eternal storms. The native inhabitants live on the majestic islands hovering high above the billowing maelstrom. Even though the inhabitants normally live in the calmer skies, their islands, over time, will be called down to the lower levels by the Tempests during what the natives call "Times of Descent". There they battle to prove their faction's worthiness to the Tempests and in so doing ascend once more to the peaceful higher realms.

High Priests
Take control of a high priest of Sonus. Your faction's priest may align to any one of the Tempest by constructing a temple dedicated to one of your choosing. Your priest is your avatar, and through your priest you may cast powerful spells to turn the tide of battle and aid your units. 
Though your priest is your avatar in-game, he is also your enemies number one goal to capture to submit as an offering to their chosen Tempest through an altar they construct.


Bridges

While some RTS game bridges may be a single point on a map to cross a river or canyon, in DOTS, bridge play is vital to expand beyond ones home islands. Placeable bridge sections not only act as pathways for your resource collecting units to travel along linked islands, but weapon platforms may also be constructed off the ends of bridges allowing players to further fortify areas, even if local islands are to small, to support many units on them.

Each bridge section may take damage and over time and could start to erode, crumbling away if not linked up with another island or have a weapons platform attached to its end.







The world of Sonus is one of shattered landscapes and floating sky islands.

Larger sky islands are home to the priests and tribes. These islands often have short undulating grass or palm like trees swaying in the wind.

Smaller sky islands, which form most of the world, often have little to no trees or vegetation but do have hardy vines that hang from their rocky edges.

Long forgotten islands are often home to ruins believed to be left over from the time of the Great Sundering. On these remote and rare islands players may find vaults of treasures for those that can capture and hold them.






  • Tempest of Wind:  Wind faction harness the power of air and wind for both defense and attack units.
  • Thunder Tempest: Thunder faction units are dark and brooding structures that flicker with charges of electricity drawing on the Tempest of Thunder to unleash lighting and devastating thunder cannon attacks over great range and zap enemy units out of the sky. 
  • Rain Tempest: Units draw on water to form ice based units with some having the ability to heal over time, ice shard casters that spew forth streams of icicle shards that bounce and scatter damaging multiple units and the rain beasts spawned from pools that drift through the air to attack nearby enemy units
  • Sun Tempest: in a world of storms even so the sun may shine through! followers of the sun while may be weaker individually are Cheap versatile and deadly in number along.  


http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=294002132

Over the past year Storm Isle Productions has been focused on creating and drafting new concepts to create new unit designs for the factions while trying to draw inspiration from old concepts. 

Neutral Shrine Building: build-able by any faction used for capturing unclaimed islands and preventing enemy from constructing on island.




Our team is seeking to create a new world in 3D that can be slowly expanded over time to bring both new units to game but also life to the world as a vivid battle field that evolves slowly as team implements more features and world assets.

Be part of gaming history by helping launch the re-conceptualized and spiritual successor of the greatest video game.

Released in 1997, NetStorm: Islands at War was a bridge-building, island-capturing, static-unit warfare RTS. NetStorm broke new ground with its unique combination of Tetris-style puzzle and chess-like game features. PC Gamer gave it a score of 91. C-Net called it “The #1 game of all time that no one ever bought.”

Launch time and promotion issues relegated NetStorm to the fringe of the evolving online gaming frontier where a strong community of enthusiasts has kept it alive for more than 15 years!

Now a talented team of game developers and former NetStorm enthusiasts, working in partnership with the original developers are seeking to create Disciples of the Storm, a 3D, full-scale RTS reboot and rebirth of the originals game-play style to life.

Our build vision aims to first establish a technically solid DOTS limited Multi-player experience. Subsequent stretch goals, in phases, will allow the full-scale vision of what we believe Disciples of the Storm can be — a totally engrossing, communal, tactics-and-strategy warfare game.

Full-scale creation on this level represents a significant amount of work and time, including new art, new models, animations, and spells. We have an extremely talented team who, with the main goal funding, can dive into producing polished content.

Your support will help us bring Disciples of the Storm from the realm of concept to reality and playability.



Our team at Storm Isle Productions is backed by original NetStorm co-creator and founder of Kongregate, Jim Greer. Kongregate is a browser based game hosting site. Along with Jim's backing we also have working with us on development

Beverly Garland who in the past has worked on Wingcommander, Ultima, Crusader no remorse, Ultima VIII: Pagan, NetStorm: Islands at war

Morgan Ogburn who worked on Ultima IX, Tron Evolution, and Resident Evil 5, NetStorm: Islands at war helping us on concepts designs for units.

Nathan Fabian a programmer from Longshot Studios who has been working on Torment: Tides of Numenera contracted with inXile Entertainment.

This collective of gaming industry leaders and bold development team envision Disciples of the Storm as not only a rebirth of the classic game-play style of NetStorm but as a strategy game that will continue to expand over time in both physical and dynamic complexity as the team will seek to actively expand and continue development well beyond release with add-ons. A wide range of new building units, weaponry, bridge styles and spells, along with flexibility in play from individual to group, to full-scale guild tournament warfare, promises to make Disciples of the Storm unlike any game currently on the market.


Sun Faction Concept Meshes

  • New IP, New World: As a top-to-bottom concept reboot, Disciples of the Storm uses a new IP for long-term stability and to avoid confusion with the the old game NetStorm. Disciples of the Storm takes place in an entirely new world with redesigned units, spells and effects.
  • The factions of the Tempest: DOTS features 4 factions with the factions of Wind, Rain, Thunder and Sun. With each side having close to 12 unit types each, along with faction neutral buildings that can be constructed by any faction to aid their cause.
  • Fast Paced Game Play: rapid gameplay of capturing and holding islands and control of pathways through islands are vital to victory as player create buffer islands to further fortify their home island.
  • Bridging system: DOTS features a custom bridging and placement system which allows placement of different bridge types allowing for construction of bridge networks to support both resource collection and expanding the battle front.
  • Tower Offense: DOTS use of different static defense and attack units with the ability to be built linked off side of bridge ends allow for construction of both on islands and out over the void of the open sky. DOTS attack and defense units and attack units draw on elements of Tower Defense meets Tower Offense.
  • Random Map Generation: DOTS feature on the fly map generation for both island generation in island shapes and with placement of islands and resources allowing for each multiplayer game to be unique.
  • Multi-platform support: DOTS supports running on Windows, Linux and Mac.

Planned features beyond Steam early access first multiplayer release.

  • Single Player Skirmish AI – Play against user selected number of AI in a single player skirmish AI with adjustable difficulty.
  • Single Player Campaign: single player campaign and mission with save and load ability.

What We Need

We have a majority of Sun unit draft concepts ready and waiting to be modeled and textured along with polished and animated model's already in-game. We are aiming to raise 10k to implement the finished assets for the Steam build for an August release that will have the first two Tempest factions of Rain and Sun implemented in-game.
If we raise the 10k and go over our set goal our one industry backer will match those funds, bringing our development war-chest to 20k.

What You Get

Backers will get a fully playable build of DOTS that will include: 1.  Two working Tempest faction of Rain and Sun faction with their respective units. 2. Working Multiplayer build where players will be able to log into the battle lobby and challenge, or host games with other players. Our goal is to release the first public release of DOTS on Steam and start growing the player base who will be able to play with the first two Tempest factions, and as the community grows, move to start implementing the remaining Tempest factions of Wind and Thunder. While the Wind faction will be in the first release of DOTS, its faction will not have polished unit meshes but will primarily have early developer assets stand-ins as placeholders.

Some of the early Developer assets art productions stand-in assets for wind faction assets until final polished art design look and models are done for the wind faction.



To those wondering, "Can the team really produce a playable build for 10k?," we invite anyone interested to watch this Twitch stream play with the folks at the Average Giants who play tested an earlier tech build of our game showing some of the functions we have implemented.

Our goal is to release the first public release of DOTS on Steam and start growing the player base who will be able to play with the first two Tempest factions, and as the community grows, move to start implementing the remaining Tempest factions of Wind and Thunder.

While the Wind faction will be in the first release of DOTS, its faction will not have polished unit meshes but will primarily have early developer assets stand-ins as placeholders.
Some of the early Developer assets art productions stand-in assets for wind faction assets until final polished art design look and models are done for the wind faction.






To those wondering, "Can the team really produce a playable build for 10k?," we invite anyone interested to watch this Twitch stream play with the folks at the Average Giants who play tested an earlier tech build of our game showing some of the functions we have implemented.

story:
A COMPLETELY NEW GAMING SERVICE, BUILT FROM THE GROUND UP!

Mean Lama is the first Play-On-Demand service for PC-Games in the world. Like other subscription based services lite Spotify, HBO and Netflix, you pay a fixed monthly fee for the whole catalogue.

Mean Lama is unique in many ways, compared to other online gaming stores. To start with, you can play as many games as you like in one month. If you don´t like a game, you just pick another one, and another one. Try that in any other store!

The platform will initially host PC-games only, but in future releases it will be available on other platforms as well. The platform will be made compatible with existing games as well as new!

The catalogue will be broad, and you will be able to find everything from the blockbusters and new titles in all genres, to the old classics.


Our Purpose

Mean Lama is the platform where game developers and software companies can reach out to the end users easier, faster and more profitable than in ”old” channels. We truly beleive that this will be the new way to consume, enjoy and distribute games. 

We want Mean Lama to be affordable enough for anyone to subscribe to! On the same time it shall be attractive for the gaming houses, so they can enjoy a new breed of sales channel aimed at a very large and extensive international online market. It will also be the end of software piracy as we know it, since there will not be any reason to do piracy anymore.


The Mean Lama Model

Our modell is what we call it ”Developer Centric”, which means that Mean Lama´s motto is to offer a really good gaming platform, and a generous payback model for the developers and gaming houses. Simplified, the model means that 2/3 of all income goes straight back to the owner of the games that are played on the platform.

One of the most interesting things about Mean Lama, is that it is open for all game developers. In other words, even if you are a small indie developer with no marketing budget, you still have the same chance as any game house. Also, for the first time ever, the developers of all the legendary games from the 80’s and 90’s have the possibility to earn a few bucks on titles that haven’t been on the shelves in decades!


So what have we come up with so far?

Technically, we have come very far. For about 1,5 years we have been working on the platform and the backend system has been tested and is ready. We use a patented new protocol, which is much faster and efficient than other gaming servers. To start up a game from installation to gameplay is very fast, even if you share internet via your mobile phone´s 3G/4G.


A package of great features!

There are many advantages with the Mean Lama Gaming platform is; the possibility to parental control and time regulation - in other words you can limit how your kids play during the day and which games they are allowed to play. Also, Mean Lama will not have any binding period. It will be 100% free from viruses and malware. As a little bonus, the platform is built to prevent saving or hacking of the games, which in the end will result in a significant change for the gaming industries loss of income due to pirating in the world.


So what do we need all this money for?

To get this going properly, we need $50 000. Here are a few things which we will invest your contribution in:

  • Build a front end user interface, and standalone player
  • Develop game API:s in order for the game devs to get paid for what you play.
  • Visit the game expo´s and indie game shows in US and Europe, in order to find all the best games available which fit into our concept.


Goodwill - A Nice Mean Lama!

For every inactive user we set aside a major part of their unused subscription fee into a fund designated completely for Charity projects around the world.  


The Challenge

We are currently working against the clock and things are going slow! We need your support in order to finalize this project and get the Mean Lama platform available to You! Together we can create something really awesome, that will change everything that has to do with gaming. We will get there – it´s just a matter of time.

THANKS!

story: Hello
story_txt: Hello

story:
Do you remember Final Fantasy 8 Triple Triad mini game? We sure do!

Revamping this game in a 4x4 grid with cool characters and in-card-game-rules it's what brought us here!

The first release of the game will be on Android, in future we will do also WP8 and iOS if things go well!


Our game is not just a triple triad clone because of some changes we have done to the gameplay! First of all, the game grid is 4x4 allowing for more tactics, secondary the cards are a lot more customizable! Instead of having some board-rule that change gameplay, those rule are embedded in the cards themselves! And YOU decide which rule apply to which card! Of course, the game design is also in testing, and everyone can contact us to suggest how to improve the gameplay! (And we also have some ideas that you won't see in the first release :P)

    


Prepare your 10 card deck and get ready to pwn everyone in single and ranked multiplayer online!



Quadra Quanctum is played on a 4x4 square grid of blank spaces where cards will be placed as the game progresses. Each card has four numbers placed in every side of the square. These numbers range from one to nine, the letter A representing ten.

There are two card colors, red (the opponent's cards) and blue (the player's cards).

In a basic game each player has ten cards. A coin-flip decides who begins. The player who wins the coin toss may choose a card to play anywhere on the grid. After the first card is played, the opposing player may play a card on any unoccupied space on the board. The game continues with players' turns alternating.

To win, a majority of the total sixteen cards played must be of the player's card color. To do this, the player must capture cards by placing a card adjacent to an opponent's card whereupon the numbers of the sides where the two cards touch will be compared. If the number of the opponent's card is higher than the player's card, the player's card will be captured and turned into the opponent's color. If the player's rank is higher, the opponent's card will be captured and changed into the player's color instead. Capturing can only occur during that player's turn, and no other opponent can capture a card during said turn.


Game Feature:

- Login with facebook (already in the beta)

- Card collection with crafting system (already in the beta)

- Single player vs IA (already in the beta)

- Multiplayer online

- Multiplayer Ranking and Leaderboard

- Player Deep Statistics!

-Everything that we will think while game progresses!


We are doing this for hobby and we have jobs related to our role in this project, so what we need is basically some plugin and asset from the unity store to make this game look great :) Also, all the game will be cloud-saved on a server of our property, so add to that a bit of money to maintain the server and the store licenses for a bit!

Also, every game needs some (or A LOT) of advertising to be known, so aside from sharing this project on facebook and twitter, we will use some money to do some advertising!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can't help us with money? Let your friends know about us! Share this page on social networks! You can also contact us if you have ideas to improve our game or if you want to share some ideas for the next one!

story:
Hello Gamer! We are Druid Gameworks, a multinational group of video game mod authors and students who have banded together remotely to create our own breed of RPG video game experience! Our journey began four years ago as hobbyists trying to break into the industry with a game design we’re passionate about. Our dream game, Witanlore: Echoes of Twilight, was quite ambitious and after testing the waters on Kickstarter to see if we could even fund the project it became clear we needed to start smaller to prove we could even make a game if we hoped to secure funding sources. We took a small alt start quest from our design doc about an Ursine player questing to protect an ancient artifact left in the care of their tribe and wove it into a new design doc for a smaller scoped RPG titled, Witanlore: Dreamtime.

While still facing some skepticism within the video game community at large we won a few diehard fans and some meager startup funds and started development. It hasn’t been a perfect road, there are challenges only time and experience can teach you but there’s nothing we aren’t willing to learn, do, or overcome to pursue our dream of someday uniting under one roof in our own studio. We developed our new design into a prototype, then an alpha, we made it through Steam Greenlight quickly topping the chart with thousands of yes votes, we brought the core game into beta and finally to Steam Early Access! We’re very proud of our game and are so close to completing the journey only to now face one of our greatest challenges:

The project budget is dead.

We estimate the core game will be finished in another 6-8 months but we’ve run out of funds and that means we’re running out of time. Reviews of the game in Early Access are quite good but we’re not selling enough units yet to sustain the team financially. Our developers have been working for almost four years, many of us full time 40+ hours a week, with no income. Mortgages, student loans, car payments, even production babies and hurricanes are putting a weighty financial strain on the team. We’ve exhausted avenues for traditional forms of funding like personal loans. Investors and even grant programs all seem hesitant to support a game by an unproven studio despite our perseverance and steady progress! We’ve also been turned down by investment groups because, despite the game looking great, it’s not following the trends of multiplayer, or VR, or because it has no micro-transactions. Our only hope at relieving the financial pressure long enough to finish Witanlore: Dreamtime is YOU.

Now maybe the big fish aren't willing to dive in with the funding we need to finish development properly and on time, but with your $5 pledges combined, all of you can give us a shot at reaching our goals and living our dream! We’ve come so far with very little support, we work hard every day to finalize the game at our highest standard, and you can make all the difference in whether we reach the end of this journey successfully or not.   

Our goal for this campaign is pretty straight forward. After IndieGoGo takes their share of the money raised, the rest goes to relieving the financial fatigue being felt by key developers and toward promoting/marketing Witanlore: Dreamtime so that it can gain enough traction to support the team moving forward.

  • Will Game Dev for Ramen! Things have been pretty tough for the team financially this past year and a half. It seems like game development is like 50% hard work and 50% dumb luck. We haven't been very lucky unfortunately so we work harder, make due with less, and persevere beyond reason because we love games and we love Witanlore! With your pledge you will be directly supporting the developers so they can continue to create the content you want to see finished!
  • Real Games Show. In order to stand out among the sea of games on the market, real contenders go to major shows like GDC, PAX, etc. We haven't been able to show Dreamtime due to budget constraints. Some of the funds raised here will go toward entry fees, travel/lodgings, and materials to show Witanlore: Dreamtime in at least one major show next year.
  • Take it to The Mountain! What's left of the funds raised will go toward increasing our media exposure in print, commercials, and social media promotions. The games that are hugely successful are the ones who make the most marketing noise. While we've been in contact with a number of PR agents and marketing masters, this effort will take some coins to get the wheels turning.

It's always nice to get something in return for your good deeds and we have lots of cool rewards tacked onto our perk tiers for you to claim, including some exclusives and some limited timed offers. All of the tiers stack so if you pledge at the $50 level, you will receive all of the rewards from the lower perks as well!

  • Insider Updates: Be the first to be in the know on all things Witanlore!
  • Special Thanks: See your name added to the Special Thanks section of our game credits
  • Early Access Game Key: Get a discount on the game while it's still in Early Access!
  • Digital Witanlore OST: Enjoy 60 Tracks of original music from the Witanlore universe
  • Exclusive Wallpaper: A unique 4K wallpaper to deck your rig in Witanlore goodness
  • Digital Postcard: A digital keepsake featuring unreleased artwork signed by the team!
  • Exclusive DLC Assassin's Cache: Follow the marks left by a legendary assassin to discover his hidden cache with unique weapons, glyphs, and gear!
  • Limited Steam Trading Card: Unlock a Limited Edition Steam Trading Card
  • Gift Key for a Friend: Get a second key for Witanlore: Dreamtime on EA to give to a friend!
  • Gift DLC Key for a Friend: Get a second key for Assassin's Cache to give to a friend!
  • Exclusive DLC Totem Creator: Restore an ancient ritual table that will allow you to customize your totem companion with new colors, markings, and more!
  • Digital Graphic Novella: Delve into Dreamtime's origin story as told through original artwork
  • Slack Focus Group Invite: Join the dev team on Slack for live chat anytime, share ideas, offer feedback, and leave your mark on the game!
  • Headstart with Mod Kit: Get your hands on our modding tool kit before anyone else.
  • Producer Credits: See your name added to the Producer section of our game credits
  • Physical Postcard: Receive a 5x7 postcard featuring never released concept art!
  • Executive Credits: See your name added to the Executive section of our game credits
  • Druid Executive T-Shirt: Wear the gear the developers wear with an executive twist
  • Druid Games Decal: Show you're part of the team with a Druid Logo decal

Some More Incentive to Pledge!

We know our goal can seem a bit daunting to reach, especially if you can only contribute a small amount; after all everyone likes to feel like their bit is achieving something! Remember EVERY pledge counts, there's no such thing as an insignificant pledge, but we wanted to create a way to make the goal feel more reachable and help those pledges count for more! So we're introducing the Unlockable Perks!

With these unlockable perks we've broken our total goal into smaller tiers. Whenever we reach one of these milestones, everyone at the $20 pledge tier and higher will receive the unlocked perk! So get to pledging! The more you pledge, the more goodies everyone gets to collect! 

We understand that some folks simply can't donate money to the cause, while every penny counts, some may not have any pennies to spare! But there are still ways you can help us achieve our goals of stabilizing the team and finishing Witanlore: Dreamtime

  • Think Outside the Web: Talk to your family, your friends, people who share your passion for great games and tell them to give Witanlore a look for themselves!
  • Recruit Others: If every person supporting the project got three friends to support too we'd reach our funding goal in no time!
  • Share Share Share: IndieGoGo has tools to help you share the campaign on your social media pages, your favorite gaming haunts, anywhere you spend your time talking about games!

The Witanlore fanbase is made up of some die hard ursine warriors and we know with your help there's nothing we can't achieve together. If you can pledge, please pledge, and if you can't please help us make some noise to keep this beautiful adventure on Early Access until it's complete!

What does “Witanlore” mean?

The simplest answer is "Wise Men's Lore"

Witanlore [pronounced WIT-ahn-lore] is a deeply rooted part of the series universe, a long dead school of study that is on the verge of becoming essential to the modern world at large. Around Arthanswold grow the old growth god trees called Witanwoods. These ancient timbers are said to have been planted by the gods and contain the magics of creation. In times long before the start of our tales, archaic wizards would study these great trees, their significance and connection to the living world, and most importantly how to harness the creation magic inside them.

The practitioners of Witanlore believed that the study of the trees was the way to unravel all the mysteries of the universe and it's that truth, that connection, that our players will seek, save, or destroy as they shape their story within our games.

What platforms will Witanlore: Dreamtime release on?

Witanlore: Dreamtime is planned for a Windows PC release only. We’re not closing any doors, it’s possible that once released we may do some conversions for other platforms, but for now focusing on one platform allows us to keep our project scope simplified. We plan to host the game on Steam, GOG, and the Druid Gameworks Webstore.

What Engine does this game run on?

Witanlore: Dreamtime is being developed on Unreal Engine 4.

Wasn't Witanlore: Dreamtime Releasing In Episodes?

The game began as a smallish core title and we later added additional story content planning to release these additions as "episodes" but Steam isn't really set up for that style of release. All future "episodes" would list as DLCs so we are referring to them as paid DLCs now to avoid confusion for buyers. We also want to gauge player interest before continuing the story, putting our main focus on finishing the core game before moving on into DLC development.

How many DLC Episodes are planned to expand Dreamtime?

There are a total of FOUR DLC Episodes planned for this title which will expand on the main story and the map, as well as introduce new companions, equipment, and quests.

How much will this game cost me?

In Early Access, the core game retails at a 65% discount for $6.99 USD which will increase over time as the amount of content increases. After Early Access, the core game will retail for $19.99 USD with DLCs priced separately based on their content.

Is this game Open World?

Yes, the map is open to free form exploration, however the playable area is limited to the core region. Our map is much larger than the current playable area to accommodate future expansion.

What kind of character can I be? Can I play as a female?

Dreamtime is an ursine story so your character is a humanoid bear. However, your avatar can be customized with options like fur color, tattoo designs, and body morphs to create your perfect ursine. You can choose between male or female.

What is the camera perspective for Witanlore: Dreamtime?

The game has a toggle feature to switch between first person and third person, as well as a zoom feature for examining detailed environment clues.

What is the Combat style like?

Combat is free form, not turn based or command prompted, though you will be able to give companions strategic commands and set their fight style before engaging an enemy.

How many Totem Animals are there? What are they?

There are 13 totem animals players can select when creating their avatar to train, level up, and companion with on their journey. The choices are Wolf, Fox, Bison, Horse, Otter, Dragon, Hawk, Owl, Snake, Rabbit, Snowcat, Wolverine, and Bear

Where can I get Witanlore or Druid Gameworks merchandise?

We currently have a Teespring storefront HERE where we run and rerun clothing prints. If there's a design you'd like to see, let us know!

Exclusive DLC Totem Creator: Restore an ancient ritual table that will allow you to customize your totem companion with new colors, markings, and more!

Digital Graphic Novella: Delve into Dreamtime's origin story as told through original artwork

Slack Focus Group Invite: Join the dev team on Slack for live chat anytime, share ideas, offer feedback, and leave your mark on the game!

Headstart with Mod Kit: Get your hands on our modding tool kit before anyone else.

Producer Credits: See your name added to the Producer section of our game credits

Physical Postcard: Receive a 5x7 postcard featuring never released concept art!

Executive Credits: See your name added to the Executive section of our game credits

Druid Executive T-Shirt: Wear the gear the developers wear with an executive twist

Druid Games Decal: Show you're part of the team with a Druid Logo decal


Some More Incentive to Pledge!
We know our goal can seem a bit daunting to reach, especially if you can only contribute a small amount; after all everyone likes to feel like their bit is achieving something! Remember EVERY pledge counts, there's no such thing as an insignificant pledge, but we wanted to create a way to make the goal feel more reachable and help those pledges count for more! So we're introducing the Unlockable Perks!

With these unlockable perks we've broken our total goal into smaller tiers. Whenever we reach one of these milestones, everyone at the $20 pledge tier and higher will receive the unlocked perk! So get to pledging! The more you pledge, the more goodies everyone gets to collect! 


We understand that some folks simply can't donate money to the cause, while every penny counts, some may not have any pennies to spare! But there are still ways you can help us achieve our goals of stabilizing the team and finishing Witanlore: Dreamtime


Think Outside the Web: Talk to your family, your friends, people who share your passion for great games and tell them to give Witanlore a look for themselves!

Recruit Others: If every person supporting the project got three friends to support too we'd reach our funding goal in no time!

Share Share Share: IndieGoGo has tools to help you share the campaign on your social media pages, your favorite gaming haunts, anywhere you spend your time talking about games!


The Witanlore fanbase is made up of some die hard ursine warriors and we know with your help there's nothing we can't achieve together. If you can pledge, please pledge, and if you can't please help us make some noise to keep this beautiful adventure on Early Access until it's complete!What does “Witanlore” mean?The simplest answer is "Wise Men's Lore"Witanlore [pronounced WIT-ahn-lore] is a deeply rooted part of the series universe, a long dead school of study that is on the verge of becoming essential to the modern world at large. Around Arthanswold grow the old growth god trees called Witanwoods. These ancient timbers are said to have been planted by the gods and contain the magics of creation. In times long before the start of our tales, archaic wizards would study these great trees, their significance and connection to the living world, and most importantly how to harness the creation magic inside them.The practitioners of Witanlore believed that the study of the trees was the way to unravel all the mysteries of the universe and it's that truth, that connection, that our players will seek, save, or destroy as they shape their story within our games.What platforms will Witanlore: Dreamtime release on?Witanlore: Dreamtime is planned for a Windows PC release only. We’re not closing any doors, it’s possible that once released we may do some conversions for other platforms, but for now focusing on one platform allows us to keep our project scope simplified. We plan to host the game on Steam, GOG, and the Druid Gameworks Webstore.What Engine does this game run on?Witanlore: Dreamtime is being developed on Unreal Engine 4.Wasn't Witanlore: Dreamtime Releasing In Episodes?The game began as a smallish core title and we later added additional story content planning to release these additions as "episodes" but Steam isn't really set up for that style of release. All future "episodes" would list as DLCs so we are referring to them as paid DLCs now to avoid confusion for buyers. We also want to gauge player interest before continuing the story, putting our main focus on finishing the core game before moving on into DLC development.How many DLC Episodes are planned to expand Dreamtime?There are a total of FOUR DLC Episodes planned for this title which will expand on the main story and the map, as well as introduce new companions, equipment, and quests.How much will this game cost me?In Early Access, the core game retails at a 65% discount for $6.99 USD which will increase over time as the amount of content increases. After Early Access, the core game will retail for $19.99 USD with DLCs priced separately based on their content.Is this game Open World?Yes, the map is open to free form exploration, however the playable area is limited to the core region. Our map is much larger than the current playable area to accommodate future expansion.What kind of character can I be? Can I play as a female?Dreamtime is an ursine story so your character is a humanoid bear. However, your avatar can be customized with options like fur color, tattoo designs, and body morphs to create your perfect ursine. You can choose between male or female.What is the camera perspective for Witanlore: Dreamtime?The game has a toggle feature to switch between first person and third person, as well as a zoom feature for examining detailed environment clues.What is the Combat style like?Combat is free form, not turn based or command prompted, though you will be able to give companions strategic commands and set their fight style before engaging an enemy.How many Totem Animals are there? What are they?There are 13 totem animals players can select when creating their avatar to train, level up, and companion with on their journey. The choices are Wolf, Fox, Bison, Horse, Otter, Dragon, Hawk, Owl, Snake, Rabbit, Snowcat, Wolverine, and BearWhere can I get Witanlore or Druid Gameworks merchandise?We currently have a Teespring storefront HERE where we run and rerun clothing prints. If there's a design you'd like to see, let us know!

story:
Well Met, Friends!

We are the Imaginary Friends Society, a young international team from Europe and India. We craft beautiful open source entertainment, and our mission is to change people’s lives through art.  

And our first project is…

Enigmaki renews the classical Sokoban with a fresh universe, additional mechanics, and hundreds of puzzles, all of that on your mobile, tablet, or PC.

Here, though, your goal isn’t to store boxes. You play as Ned, the masked koala with striped socks, who climbs the floors of a mysterious tower by storing large and delicious makis onto their respective plates.

There are different types of makis: avocado makis move by one square at a time; salmon makis only stop when reaching another object; and so on… You will find crates, too, which will be in your way … alongside many obstacles, quests, collectibles, etc.

(Current visuals aren't definitive.)

Meet the Society

Why this Campaign?

As you certainly understand, developing a great game takes time. In our present situation, we think we can release the version 1.0 of Enigmaki in December 2017, and we have funds to survive until … August 2017. Beyond that, we will starve to death. Not only it is a very unpleasant prospect to us, but you will agree this can make things slightly difficult when it comes to developing Enigmaki…

If we want to survive until December, we need €30 272, which cuts into those expenses:

However, the impact of supporting us would be much greater. Indeed, having an audience to display would help us reaching to investors, and survive as a team and a company beyond December. That would allow us to keep making great games, and we would be super happy!

If you can't back us —even one of the smaller perks?— you still have the possibility to help us. For instance, it would make us so happy if you could talk to your friends or relatives about Enigmaki… All you need is to share this link: https://igg.me/at/enigmaki —or use the social media icons above with the #enigmaki hashtag.

Of course, if you are an investor yourself (or know one), we would love to hear from you! We're available at all time at please.reply@imaginary-friends-society.com

Perks and Rewards

For comparison sake, non backers would have access to the following once we release Enigmaki:

  • For free: tutorial & early levels, as well as quests (which may require advancement in the story)
  • Story Mode: 100+ levels, for a fixed amount
  • Little Extras: character skins for customisation, some help if you're stucked in a level, each for a small amount
  • Hermitage Membership: a monthly or yearly subscription that provides a weekly selection of Little Extras, exclusive skins… (other advantages may be added later on)

Of course, there should be advantage for our beloved backers. We have prepared a list of perks for every line of budget, so you can help us to the extent of your abilities…

Most included items should be self-explanatory, but do not hesitate to ask us for more information! Here is some additional information you may need:

  • Digital wallpaper set: 5 beautiful Enigmaki wallpapers for your mobile, tablet, and PC
  • Your digital portrait: made in the same style than our portraits above
  • Backer character's skin: a very special character skin, exclusively available to backers
  • Enigmaki booklet: ~25 pages about Enigmaki, its world and lore, and their making
  • Deluxe Enigmaki booklet: the same, with better paper, and a special cover
  • Print set: 5 posters, 5 postcards, and 2 bookmarks, all beautifully printed on a nice paper
  • Etiquette book: ~50 pages filled with real world practical explanations on how to properly behave in the company of imaginary ladies and gentlemen… a must have!
  • Deluxe Etiquette book: the same, with better paper and a special cover
  • Linen tart-holder bag: it will have a beautiful Enigmaki textile illustration on it that will make you stand out as the perfect cook; it works too for cakes and maki boxes
  • Soft toy set: 2 options: an extra-large soft toy, or many small soft toys within a beautifully crafted box
  • Piggy bank: shaped as a maki, with a corkscrew tail
  • Your own in-game spirimonster: we will help you with the design, so it remain consistent within the lore and suitable for younger audiences
  • Your secret in-game message: text only, no link; we will refuse undisguised advertising and anything inappropriate for younger audiences
  • Your own in-game level: we will help you with the design
  • Your portrait on a canvas: made in the same style than our portraits above, printed on canvas

Achievements

For each of the following achievement, we will add 2 extra digital wallpapers for all backers!

  • 500 backers
  • 500 followers on Facebook
  • 500 followers on Twitter
  • 100 retweets of the pinned tweet on @imfriends_
  • 100 tweets with the #enigmaki hashtag (not including our own tweets)
  • 10 Enigmaki fan-art
  • 10 photos of a pagoda (with you)
  • 10 photos of unique Enigmaki-inspired bento food-art
  • 5 photos of Ned the koala cosplays
  • 1 of the limited perks has 10 claims

Fan-art and photos should be respectively made by you or taken by you or a friend, and sent to us on social media or email. We can add a maki over your face if you ask for it. In any case, we will publish them on our Twitter account!

Thank You!

story:
The Story of Drunk on Trump: The Greatest Board Game Ever Made.

Team DOT started with Clyde (a Painter and part time builder ), Josh (an American drummer) and Jess (a bag designer) on a Saturday night in Whitechapel. We decided to come up with a game, for no other reason than to entertain ourselves. With an enjoyment of politics, a mutual dislike of Trump, a love for drinking and stupidity, we had a good blend of topics to create a game for the evening. 

The game proved quite fun and to be honest I don’t remember the latter part of the night.

 After board one we didn’t think much more of it but did play it a few times with friends. About 4 months later I was invited to a launch of a product, a whoopy cushion with trumps face on it, I didn’t go but did see it in a prominent news paper and thought hmmm, so we got back together.

Many rethinks of the game where drawn up on computer until we arrived at 'the greatest board game ever made' and a Drunk on Trump party at my flat was in order to see how it played out. It was great fun, we changed a few things and the final board was made, after many hours on Google to see how we could produce the product, we put together a plan to launching DOT

The final Board

 

Making the video: After looking at Indiegogo with the very small budge, we decided we needed a video for the campaign. After harassing friends and asking around we found a young aspiring film maker, Hedley Marks. I had an idea for the video and after a few back and forths, we had a deal. He was booked to start filming with Will Duffield the following week.

 

Being a builder, I then got to making the set in my flat. With five days to build, one day to film and the help of many friend some how we had a pretty cool video.  

 

So hear we are now, we hope you like the video and can get behind us on making the game a reality for the masses!

Game Overview

Drunk on Trump is a simple game where each player chooses a coloured counter and in turn takes all the bricks of that colour. The objective of the game is to get all your bricks down to build a wall around your side of the board. The first player to finish their bricks wins.

When moving around the board there are many silly and fun things to land on such as Trump cards which are placed on the board, Trump cards contain dares and drinking penalties.

Example of trump cards:

There are also 10 blank trump cards for you to create your own fun.

Another thing a player may land on is the policy pot which is placed on the board. If players land on certain squares, they may have to put a % of their drink in the policy pot or even have to drink it.

Drunk On Trump is a very silly and entertaining game that pokes fun at Trump in a playful way.

What We Need & What You Get

  • All the money we raise from this campaign will go straight into these two areas only:

1. Getting the game printed - 1500 order minimum.

2. Using the rest of the funds to market the game and make it widely known.

Our main perk for this campaign is you getting your very own Drunk on Trump board game!

The Impact

As you can see this game has gone from an idea into actual prototypes and board games produced. We are making great headway but have a very tight deadline before the elections to make this game fun and still relevant!

If you share a mutual love for the idiocies of Trump, or if you want to take the game a bit literal as a Trump fan, we hope you love this game as much as we do!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and that's ok! We kindly ask that you share this campaign with your friends to help us get the word out and make our board game a reality!

A big big thank you from team DOT!

story:
完整計劃！The Full Plan!

這個深入的影片將回答你有關於咒文的任何問題!
This in depth video will answer any questions that you have about 咒文!

 

仁咒義蛋 The Enchanted Egg

玩家將扮演"咒"（Joe）的角色，這是一個巧妙的蛋黃，他的主人在他死前委託他保護帝國免受黑魔法。 然而，喬不是他主人第一次創造這樣一個監護人的嘗試。 原來的創作是"呪"，但他們的主人認為他是一個失敗的企圖。

The player will take the role of 咒 (Joe – Zhou), an enchanted egg yolk who was entrusted by his master before his death to protect the empire from dark magic. However, Joe was not his master’s first attempt at creating such a guardian. The original creation was 呪 (Zhou - the alternative form of the caracter 咒), however their master considered him to be a failed attempt. 

憤怒的這個咒的更老的雙胞胎尋求報復，把咒從他的第一次機會出帝國。 這把咒發射到一個被稱為羅馬帝國的奇怪和遙遠的土地上。 雖然有人咒設法在拉丁語學習權力的話。 現在他必須利用他的外國魔法，以奪回他在帝國的合法地位。在這個故事中有很多幽默和胡言亂語之間因為咒說中國人與外國口音和他畸形和權力飢餓雙胞胎。

Enraged by this Joe’s older twin 呪 sought revenge and cast Joe out of the empire at his first chance. This launched Joe to a strange and distant land known as the Roman Empire. While there Joe managed to learn words of power in Latin. Now he must utilize his foreign magic in order to take back his rightful place in the empire.Within this story there is a lot of space for humor and banter between Joe who speaks Chinese with a foreign accent and his malformed and power hungry twin.

 

咒教學法 Learning with Joe

然而，這個故事只是好上加好; 一個傳達希臘和拉丁語根源的環境，鼓勵玩家發展他們的詞典。 這是一個幾乎完全沒有開發的東西教西方語言的方法。 玩家和學生在玩這個遊戲後應該離開的概念是，當咒升級時，他們也會！
 

However, the story is merely and icing on the cake; a context in which to convey Greek and Latin roots in a manner that will encourage players to develop their lexicons. This is an almost completely untapped method for teaching western languages in the east. The concept that players and students should come away with after playing this game is that as Joe levels up so do they!

遊戲機制是為了做到這一點。 如果看看遊戲演示，將會看到幾個非常有趣的方面，推動玩家利用他們已經學到的所有內容。 在這些屏幕的頂部是一個線程，指示哪些敵人正在接近咒，除了怪物，還有魔法被施加在咒的方向。 咒可以利用任何需要的法術來打開一個敵人，打開類型字段通過按鈕"念咒"，這將打開一個在他面前的一個圓圈。

The gameplay mechanics are set up to do just that. If one looks at the game demo one will see several very interesting facets that push the players to utilize all that they have already learned. At the top of these screen is a thread that indicates which enemies are approaching Joe and besides monsters there are also magic spells being cast in Joe’s direction. Joe can utilize any spell he needs to take down a foe by opening the type field by hitting the button 念咒 (nianzhou – cast spell), this will open a circle in front of him.

在特定的根中輸入一個具有與其意義相關的效果的法術。 例如，簡單的負前綴 "anti"(抗), "de"(低), "dis"(反) 和 "un"(無) 將導致損害。 然而，諸如 "bene"(仁) 的法術將癒合並且"micro"(微) 將收縮和減慢傳入的敵人。

Typing in a specific root will cast a spell with an effect associated with its meaning. For example simple negative prefixes such as anti-, de-, dis- and un- will cause damage. However a spell such as bene- would heal and micro- would shrink and slow an incoming enemy.


此外，在結束的水平和特定的敵人的老闆也將施放法術。 例如死靈法師會施放法術"死"，因此咒必須直接中和這個法術，使用拉丁當量法。 此外，"pryo(火)的等同物將是熱，"aqua"(水)，"multi"(多)，"mal"(惡)和"photo"(光) 。 可能性幾乎是無限的，因為希臘和拉丁語的根對與許多漢字相當好，因為它們都是古老的起源; 在某種意義上，中文是亞洲的拉丁文。

Moreover the boss at the end of the level and specific foes will also be casting spells. For instance a necromancer would be casting the spell 死 (se – death), therefore Joe must directly neutralize this spell with it’s Latin equivalent mort-. Furthermore the equivalent of 火(huo - fire) would be pyro-, 水(shui – water) aqua-, 多(duo – many) multi-, 惡(e – evil) mal- and 光(guang – light) photo-. The possibilities are nearly limitless, as Greek and Latin roots pair fairly nicely with many Chinese characters because they are both archaic in origin; and in a sense Chinese is the Latin of Asia.

看空格鍵，我們可以看到它用來傳達關於剛剛施放的法術的具體信息。 如根的名稱，法術的傷害和法術力費用。 這些水平將取決於使用法術的頻率，例如，如果玩家不斷輸入法術"anti-"，隨著時間的推移法術力費用將上升，損失輸出將下降。 這是遊戲中的一個關鍵因素，因為它鼓勵玩家循環通過他們的所有劇目中的所有法術，以完全有效地消耗法力和傷害敵人。

Looking at the spacebar one can see that it is used to convey specific information about the spell just cast. Such as the name of the root, the damage of the spell and the mana cost. These levels will very depending on the frequency in which a spell is used, for example if a player were to constantly type the spell anti- , over time the mana cost would rise and the damage output would fall. This is a key element in gameplay because it encourages the player to cycle through all of the spells in their repertoire in order to be completely efficient in spending mana and damaging enemies.


通過每個階段，玩家將面對一個結束老闆，這將丟棄紙張揭示下一階段的法術。 這個下一個咒文將被下一關的老闆重複施放，從而迫使玩家記住它的拉丁語。 隨著咒進一步向東移動，他將穿過中國的小鄉和城市，直到他到達國會大廈，他將在最後面對他的兄弟。

Through each stage players will face an end boss, which will drop a scrap of paper reveling the spell of the next stage. This next spell will be repeatedly cast by the boss of the next level and thus will force the player to memorize its Latin equivalent. As Joe moves further towards the east he will pass through towns and cities of China until he reaches the capitol where he will face his brother at long last.

陽關大道! A Bright Future!

如果咒文成功，就有更多可能性可以用於擴展，進而用來推動標題。 有一個取之不盡，用之不竭的希臘和拉丁根，利用這樣的特許經銷可以經營運行多年。 每個遊戲都可以沿著中國歷史上一個著名人物的道路，並提供一個扭曲，卻讓我們著迷的蛋黃朋友分享他影響歷史的作用。

Should 咒文 become a success there are many possibilities for expansions that could be utilized to move the title forward. With a large well of Greek and Latin roots to draw upon such a franchise could run for years. Each game could follow the path of a famous character within Chinese history, and provide a twist in which our enchanted yolk friend shares his role in influencing history. 

咒和下西洋 Joe and the South West Seas

第一個可以沿著鄭和下西洋的路徑探索誰在印度洋交易帶來巨大的財富和奇蹟回到帝國。 這個遊戲可以叫“咒和下西洋”。

The first of these could follow the path of 鄭和(Zhenghe) the sea explore who traded across the Indian ocean bringing massive wealth and wonders back to the empire. This game could be called “咒和下西洋” (Zhou he Xiaxiyang – Joe and the South West Seas).

呪蒙古之入侵 The Accursed Mongol Invasion

另一個續集將與玩家分享咒的雙胞胎兄弟藉由成吉思汗的幫助下展開的歸途之旅，標題為：“呪蒙古之入侵”。

Another sequel would share with the player the implications of a return from Joe’s twin with the aid of Genghis Khan in what would be titled: 呪蒙古之入侵(Zhou Menggu zhi Ruqin – The Accursed Mongol Invasion). 

撕裂在絲綢之路 The Tear in the Silk Road

最後咒可以回到他在西方的帝國    同時展開名為“撕裂在絲綢之路”的冒險

Finally Joe could make his return to the empires of the west in his adventure in “撕裂在絲綢之路” (Silie zai Sichouzhilu – The Tear in the Silk Road).

旭日之本源 The Origin of the Rising Sun

如果這些續集被證明是成功的，那麼可以安全地假設，其他使用漢字的語言也可以使用特許經營 - 例如日語。 正如咒幫助中國歷史的人物一樣，他也可以幫助大田和豐臣秀吉統一日本：“旭日之本源”（Kyokujitsu no Hongen）。 正如中國，日本都有悠久的歷史，蘊含成千上萬的漢字，可以與希臘和拉丁語配對。

If these sequels proved to be successful then it would be safe to assume that using the franchise for other languages that utilize Chinese characters may also work - case in point Japanese. Just as Joe helped the figures of Chinese history he could also aid Oda and Toyotomi unify Japan in: “旭日之本源” (Kyokujitsu no Hongen – The Origin of the Rising Sun). Just as in China, Japan has a lush history to draw upon and thousands of kanji that can be paired with Greek and Latin. 

厲害部首 Radical Chinese

咒還有一個地方教英語系玩家如何在"Radical Chinese"這個遊戲對中文有更好的理解，並幫助玩家熟悉中文部首。 以同樣的方式，希臘和拉丁語的根源開拓了英語學習者新詞彙，中文學習者也能夠利用中文的部首邏輯快速的辨認漢字。 這將使任何學習中文的人在閱讀和寫作語言時都有巨大的優勢。

Joe also has a place in teaching English speakers how to better understand Chinese in the game “Radical Chinese”. In which he would help the player become familiarized with what is known as 部首(bushou – radicals). In the same manner that Greek and Latin roots open up English learners to new vocabulary, so too will Chinese learners be able to quickly decipher the logic within 漢字(hanzi – Chinese characters) through the radicals of Chinese . This will give anyone studying Chinese a huge advantage when it comes to reading and writing the language.
story_txt:
完整計劃！The Full Plan!
這個深入的影片將回答你有關於咒文的任何問題!This in depth video will answer any questions that you have about 咒文!


 
仁咒義蛋 The Enchanted Egg

玩家將扮演"咒"（Joe）的角色，這是一個巧妙的蛋黃，他的主人在他死前委託他保護帝國免受黑魔法。 然而，喬不是他主人第一次創造這樣一個監護人的嘗試。 原來的創作是"呪"，但他們的主人認為他是一個失敗的企圖。
The player will take the role of 咒 (Joe – Zhou), an enchanted egg yolk who was entrusted by his master before his death to protect the empire from dark magic. However, Joe was not his master’s first attempt at creating such a guardian. The original creation was 呪 (Zhou - the alternative form of the caracter 咒), however their master considered him to be a failed attempt. 
憤怒的這個咒的更老的雙胞胎尋求報復，把咒從他的第一次機會出帝國。 這把咒發射到一個被稱為羅馬帝國的奇怪和遙遠的土地上。 雖然有人咒設法在拉丁語學習權力的話。 現在他必須利用他的外國魔法，以奪回他在帝國的合法地位。在這個故事中有很多幽默和胡言亂語之間因為咒說中國人與外國口音和他畸形和權力飢餓雙胞胎。
Enraged by this Joe’s older twin 呪 sought revenge and cast Joe out of the empire at his first chance. This launched Joe to a strange and distant land known as the Roman Empire. While there Joe managed to learn words of power in Latin. Now he must utilize his foreign magic in order to take back his rightful place in the empire.Within this story there is a lot of space for humor and banter between Joe who speaks Chinese with a foreign accent and his malformed and power hungry twin.


 
咒教學法 Learning with Joe

然而，這個故事只是好上加好; 一個傳達希臘和拉丁語根源的環境，鼓勵玩家發展他們的詞典。 這是一個幾乎完全沒有開發的東西教西方語言的方法。 玩家和學生在玩這個遊戲後應該離開的概念是，當咒升級時，他們也會！
 
However, the story is merely and icing on the cake; a context in which to convey Greek and Latin roots in a manner that will encourage players to develop their lexicons. This is an almost completely untapped method for teaching western languages in the east. The concept that players and students should come away with after playing this game is that as Joe levels up so do they!
遊戲機制是為了做到這一點。 如果看看遊戲演示，將會看到幾個非常有趣的方面，推動玩家利用他們已經學到的所有內容。 在這些屏幕的頂部是一個線程，指示哪些敵人正在接近咒，除了怪物，還有魔法被施加在咒的方向。 咒可以利用任何需要的法術來打開一個敵人，打開類型字段通過按鈕"念咒"，這將打開一個在他面前的一個圓圈。
The gameplay mechanics are set up to do just that. If one looks at the game demo one will see several very interesting facets that push the players to utilize all that they have already learned. At the top of these screen is a thread that indicates which enemies are approaching Joe and besides monsters there are also magic spells being cast in Joe’s direction. Joe can utilize any spell he needs to take down a foe by opening the type field by hitting the button 念咒 (nianzhou – cast spell), this will open a circle in front of him.在特定的根中輸入一個具有與其意義相關的效果的法術。 例如，簡單的負前綴 "anti"(抗), "de"(低), "dis"(反) 和 "un"(無) 將導致損害。 然而，諸如 "bene"(仁) 的法術將癒合並且"micro"(微) 將收縮和減慢傳入的敵人。Typing in a specific root will cast a spell with an effect associated with its meaning. For example simple negative prefixes such as anti-, de-, dis- and un- will cause damage. However a spell such as bene- would heal and micro- would shrink and slow an incoming enemy.
此外，在結束的水平和特定的敵人的老闆也將施放法術。 例如死靈法師會施放法術"死"，因此咒必須直接中和這個法術，使用拉丁當量法。 此外，"pryo(火)的等同物將是熱，"aqua"(水)，"multi"(多)，"mal"(惡)和"photo"(光) 。 可能性幾乎是無限的，因為希臘和拉丁語的根對與許多漢字相當好，因為它們都是古老的起源; 在某種意義上，中文是亞洲的拉丁文。

Moreover the boss at the end of the level and specific foes will also be casting spells. For instance a necromancer would be casting the spell 死 (se – death), therefore Joe must directly neutralize this spell with it’s Latin equivalent mort-. Furthermore the equivalent of 火(huo - fire) would be pyro-, 水(shui – water) aqua-, 多(duo – many) multi-, 惡(e – evil) mal- and 光(guang – light) photo-. The possibilities are nearly limitless, as Greek and Latin roots pair fairly nicely with many Chinese characters because they are both archaic in origin; and in a sense Chinese is the Latin of Asia.

看空格鍵，我們可以看到它用來傳達關於剛剛施放的法術的具體信息。 如根的名稱，法術的傷害和法術力費用。 這些水平將取決於使用法術的頻率，例如，如果玩家不斷輸入法術"anti-"，隨著時間的推移法術力費用將上升，損失輸出將下降。 這是遊戲中的一個關鍵因素，因為它鼓勵玩家循環通過他們的所有劇目中的所有法術，以完全有效地消耗法力和傷害敵人。
Looking at the spacebar one can see that it is used to convey specific information about the spell just cast. Such as the name of the root, the damage of the spell and the mana cost. These levels will very depending on the frequency in which a spell is used, for example if a player were to constantly type the spell anti- , over time the mana cost would rise and the damage output would fall. This is a key element in gameplay because it encourages the player to cycle through all of the spells in their repertoire in order to be completely efficient in spending mana and damaging enemies.

通過每個階段，玩家將面對一個結束老闆，這將丟棄紙張揭示下一階段的法術。 這個下一個咒文將被下一關的老闆重複施放，從而迫使玩家記住它的拉丁語。 隨著咒進一步向東移動，他將穿過中國的小鄉和城市，直到他到達國會大廈，他將在最後面對他的兄弟。
Through each stage players will face an end boss, which will drop a scrap of paper reveling the spell of the next stage. This next spell will be repeatedly cast by the boss of the next level and thus will force the player to memorize its Latin equivalent. As Joe moves further towards the east he will pass through towns and cities of China until he reaches the capitol where he will face his brother at long last.



陽關大道! A Bright Future!
如果咒文成功，就有更多可能性可以用於擴展，進而用來推動標題。 有一個取之不盡，用之不竭的希臘和拉丁根，利用這樣的特許經銷可以經營運行多年。 每個遊戲都可以沿著中國歷史上一個著名人物的道路，並提供一個扭曲，卻讓我們著迷的蛋黃朋友分享他影響歷史的作用。

Each game could follow the path of a famous character within Chinese history, and provide a twist in which our enchanted yolk friend shares his role in influencing history. 
咒和下西洋 Joe and the South West Seas

第一個可以沿著鄭和下西洋的路徑探索誰在印度洋交易帶來巨大的財富和奇蹟回到帝國。 這個遊戲可以叫“咒和下西洋”。

另一個續集將與玩家分享咒的雙胞胎兄弟藉由成吉思汗的幫助下展開的歸途之旅，標題為：“呪蒙古之入侵”。

Finally Joe could make his return to the empires of the west in his adventure in “撕裂在絲綢之路” (Silie zai Sichouzhilu – The Tear in the Silk Road).

如果這些續集被證明是成功的，那麼可以安全地假設，其他使用漢字的語言也可以使用特許經營 - 例如日語。 正如咒幫助中國歷史的人物一樣，他也可以幫助大田和豐臣秀吉統一日本：“旭日之本源”（Kyokujitsu no Hongen）。 正如中國，日本都有悠久的歷史，蘊含成千上萬的漢字，可以與希臘和拉丁語配對。

Joe also has a place in teaching English speakers how to better understand Chinese in the game “Radical Chinese”. In which he would help the player become familiarized with what is known as 部首(bushou – radicals). In the same manner that Greek and Latin roots open up English learners to new vocabulary, so too will Chinese learners be able to quickly decipher the logic within 漢字(hanzi – Chinese characters) through the radicals of Chinese . This will give anyone studying Chinese a huge advantage when it comes to reading and writing the language.

story:
Who am I?

A mid-level programmer, top-level worker with big ideas and dreams and a hardcore gamer. 
Unsatisfied by the games nowadays and how the big companies treat the consumers and the feedback, I want to build a company from scratch, which listens to users, take into account their opinion and reward them.
I don't want this company to be about profit, Sure, to  make money you need money but, to have a successful company you first and foremost need to get in tune with gamers' hearts. 
So basically I have planned 6 games concepts, 5 of those are on mobile and 1 on PC and console. For starters, the games will be made in Unity.
 Help me build the future of gaming, our future.
Screenshots from games on which I'm working:


From what you can see I need help with the design.
What We Need & What You Get

To launch this company I need:

  • A place to work, an apartment/space to buy/rent.
  • Hire people, need 6 game developers, 3 designers, 1 marketing employee and salaries for at least 1 year , I will be the web developer and game developer.
  • Laptops, Desktops and licenses for programs that we will use.
  • Money for consumables, utilities.

The Impact

I want to deliver games on every platform. We will start with mobile games Android and IOS, browser, PC, Linux, Mac, Consoles(Xbox and PlayStation).

Other Ways to Help

Don’t hesitate to talk about this project to others around you and to share it on social networks.  This would be an enormous help!

PERKS

After the company will start making profit, and we can make this happen, I will select the most rated game which will have the best sales, and I will give back to you the percentage you had invested, from the profit made by that game for 5 years. So if your money invested in us represents 1% from all the money which was invested in us during this campaign(or 1% from the campaign goal if the campaign goal is not achieved), every year for 5 years you will receive 1% of the profits made by the game that year.
Also you will receive in-game gifts, free games depending on the amount you had invested and invitations to every alpha and beta games which we will launch,

story:
I am a mechatronic engineer with a desire to make his own independent software development company, as an amateur and self-taught video game programmer, I have already made several prototypes of games, unfortunately I currently work for a company that consumes most of my time. It is not possible for me to carry out a large-scale project because of the limited amount of time invested.

The financing required here is to start working on this type of projects full time and to make the first demo of the game.

Even if you can't make a donation today, you can help us by telling your friends about us, sharing our Indiegogo page to your social media, and by following us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!  Thank you so much for your support!

The demo game would be Free in Play Store for Android 4+

https://twitter.com/IndieGen_Dev

see our progress! Download in Android Play Store Here!

How do we do it?

The development of the video game has been made so far completely in the AIDE app - http://www.android-ide.com/

The code is written in Java and using the framework for the development of videogames multiplatform Libgdx, currently supporting Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, Android and IOS.

You can already try our progress! Here! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.indiegen.darktactics

With each update you can witness the evolution of DarkTactics. This beta version is hardly a demonstration for our followers is not a complete game. The only purpose is to improve with your your opinion.

 

Cost Breakdown

     

  • Name: Oliver XXXXX.
  • Age: 2X
  • Rol: Main character
  • Story: Desperation leads him to investigate the meaning in the nightmare that he lives every time he sleeps
