story:
Versione in Italiano (italian version): https://goo.gl/e4pqGc

Sons of Dropp is a new concept of interactive online story that merges the principles of Role Playing with those of transmedia narration.

A constantly evolving virtual world which can be explored by navigating freely on the official website and Social Network platforms connected to it.

Immerse yourself into the setting, interact in real time with characters, join quests, earn experience points and influence the storyline with your choices.

In Sons of Dropp the story is not yet defined and much of his course depends on you too.

Available late 2018

 

The story begins in the city of Dropp, cornerstone of a universe that freely mingles the Western and Fantasy genres, to create a Weird-West setting where classic 19th-century elements of the Old West blend with modern technology.

In the middle of a deserted wasteland, features of the past meet modernity in a mixture of sand, wood, electricity and machinery, providing a unique environment for the game.

The city is built online and set in specific Locations hosted on the Social Network platforms and on the Official Site. Each Location has its own function and dedicated contents, and is usually managed by a Main Character.

The world structure and narrative form are based on the principles of transmedia storytelling, where different media contribute to the development of the story, creating a richer and more engaging user experience.

To visit and interact with a specific Location, the user will simply have to go the platform hosting it:

The once flourishing city of Dropp now lies in ruins, after a terrible earthquake triggered a series of catastrophic events that put it down on its knees.

Only a few areas and buildings are left standing in the city, and that is where the user, who will in all respects become one of its citizens, will start living his own adventure, in a world in constant evolution!

EVery Location will have its function and content. here you could find Quest to join, main characters opinion about the story events and more detail about the narration. 

The Last Dropp Inn, where  you can drink the excellent Mesaz of the rough innkeeper Boris Malgor and the Street, guarded by the mysterious Stranger will be hosted respectively on Facebook and Twitter.

The Public Library, managed by the wise librarian Judith Sandoval and the Construction Yard, a symbol of rebirth, directed by the brilliant engineer Majr Zonza, can be visited on the official website of Sons of Dropp.

Also the Kamizu Shrine, where the deity Kamizu is worshipped, will be hosted on the official site.

Is very important to note that characters will be "run" by real people! So dialogues will be 100% spontaneous!

 

Narration and Interaction will be organized as follow:

  • The Main Story is narrated through Animated Episodes, that generate small "Narrative Arcs".
  • The length of each narrative arc will vary, but their average duration in the real world will be of about 1 month.
  • Within each narrative arc, a system of Quests, Missions and Random Events will help the users/citizens deepen their understanding of the narrative universe and interact with it through:
    • Quests linked to the primary storyline (and thus with the events narrated in the animated episodes);
    • Side Quests that can trigger smaller and secondary storylines;
    • Natural or Random Events that can affect the city and will require the participation of a number of citizens to be addressed;
    • Missions proposed by Characters.
  • Upon the completion of all Main Quests linked to an animated episode, the next episode will start, giving way to a new narrative arc that will allow the story to continue.

The virtual narrative world continues to exist and evolve, even when the users are not online, thanks to the authors running it behind the curtain.

Sons of Dropp is set up as a "persistent world", in which Time plays an innovative role: even if you decide to stay out of the action for a day, important events may still occur and you could be thrown into an ongoing cataclysm or an enemy invasion on your next visit.

If that happens, you can still catch up on the story by viewing the animated episodes, that will always be accessible, or by going through the Summary Section on the website.


In some cases, the behaviour of the community may influence and change the course of events. Secondary storylines can actually generate situations where the community inputs and decisions will determine the outcome of an issue.

In the image above:

  • A. Quest ask citizens to get rid of infected in a specific area in the city.
  • B. After this, a new Quest will begin, asking to remove corpses all around to avoid a new infection. In this case, a minimum number of users have to join and succeed the quest.
  • C. If the number of users IS NOT REACHED, the quest is failed and the infection starts again, even worst than before.
  • D. In the other case, the problem is solved and order restored. For the moment...

It is important to understand that this is not a videogame you’ll be looking at, nor an online game or a browser game. It is a new and different experience that has, as we have said, a compelling story.

The user interface on the site will therefore be reduced to a minimum, to give us the opportunity to elastically manage and elaborate the story and the events narrated, ensuring a varied and engaging interaction.

The official website will perform the following important functions:​

- It will be a connection to the whole narrative universe. In the homepage there will be a map that will indicate which locations are reachable in the present moment. A section that will summarize all the narrative events will also be available.

- It will manage the points and equipment system. In the profile created on the site will be collected all information about the "status" of the citizen: experience points acquired, equipment unlocked, current level.

- It will host some locations. In the Public Library section, for example, you can access archive of the city (Game Bible) where you will find all the information on the elements that make up the narrative universe, or you can find out if the librarian has some Quests to propose.


The Quests and Missions System represents the way in which citizens will be called to action.

The setting will be as follows:

The types of Quest will be different:

CREATIVE QUESTS: they present an opening narration and ask the citizen to write his actions describing how he would deal with the proposed situation. The more creative and consistent with the opening narration the descriptions will be, the more chance you have to beat the Quest.

EQUIPMENT QUESTS: in the next paragraph we will explain how it will be possible to unlock equipment that will allow the citizen to participate in this type of Quest.

  • It foresees initially hidden equipment.
  • The colors of the equipment icons indicate the type of equipment required.
  • The citizen must choose between the equipment he has already unlocked, commenting on the Quest with the elements he considers necessary to deal with the situation.
  • It is mandatory to comment with a number of items equal to the number of the hidden ones.
  • When the Quest concludes, the requirements are published and the citizens who have guessed them pass the Quest.

Quest at its launch:

Quest resolved:

Note: The opening narration of the Quest provides valuable information about the necessary equipment.

If the description suggests, for example, to act in silence, there is a good chance that the required weapon is not a firearm but a silent weapon!

MULTIPLE ANSWER QUESTS: data una situazione bisognerà scegliere l'azione reputata più giusta tra quelle proposte  

OTHER TYPOLOGIES which we will reveal further ahead​

Not all the Quests will be available by browsing the site only. It may happen that they are issued in one of the locations hosted by social networks, which is why we recommend exploring the entire "universe".

 

Participating in the Quests guarantees the acquisition of:

  1. Experience Points
  2. Currency Points

EXPERIENCE POINTS can be earned:

  • Succeeding in the Quests
  • Participating in the proposed activities (eg surveys)
  • Visualizing, sharing and commenting on content (video and news)
  • Inviting friends to sign on
  • Visiting the site daily
  • ...and more!

and will allow:

  • To Advance a Level
  • To Unlock Weapons, Items and Skills
  • Rise up in the community rankings to get access to the Duel of the Month and win real prizes!

 

CURRENCY POINTS can be used to:

  • Unlock discount coupons for the official Store
  • Contribute to the construction of new locations (thus expanding the setting and the characteristics of the narrative universe)
  • Access exclusive content

 

Weapons, Items and Skills are the elements to be used in the Equipment Quests and can be obtained in different ways:

  • By moving up a Level
  • Purchasing them at the city emporium
  • As a reward for succeeding in a quest

 

Every month the first 3 citizens in the ranking will participate in the Duel of the Month, ie in a specific quest for this circumstance. The winner will be rewarded with a digital or real prize and his name will be engraved forever in the Dropp Hall of Fame!

 

 

Sons of Dropp is an experience to be enjoyed following the pulse of its citizenship, stopping by every day in different locations, discovering what is new in town and participating in the events.

The play time is totally up to the users and should be regular; it is impossible to define it as "gaming sessions".

The days in Dropp will run in parallel to the real-world days and it will be up to the citizens to decide when, how and how much they want to participate in the adventure in order to feel satisfied, knowing that the main story will still be following the natural course of events.

 

NOTE: Perk starting from VIP CITIZEN on include "Chronicles of Dropp volume", that will be ready in the first half of 2019. For these perks, we can ship a digital version of every other object in October 2018, and then ship every physical object when the volume will be ready.

Perk description: 

Citizenship Certificate: ​A testimonial to your citizenship, something to be proud of! Printed in A4 from authorities of Dropp, numbered and with your name

Tourist Guide: All you need to know to organize in the best way your trip to the most charming and dangerous city on the planet Hyle is here ...  Contains story, attractives and pastimes in Dropp. It also includes hints on how to enjoy Sons of Dropp at its best! Are you ready to go?

Passport: The official ID document of every citizen. It contains a complete list of all unlockables objects in the game, and is a great way to mark your unlocked equipment. Keep track of your progress here and always bring it with you to choose equip for quests in a faster and cooler way! Is a small format booklet and will fit your pockets!

Create a secondary storyline: Work with the team and contribute in creating a secondary storyline and its quests.

Libro "Le Cronache di Dropp": A volume which gather all the events that will be narrated in the launching season of Sons of Dropp, in novel form. Best actions user will perform during the adventure will be included too, and you could have the chance to read about your epic  exploits! (also digital).

Hardcover Artbook: A collection of concept art and artworks which gave life to this project

Your Bio in the Public Library: create your own bio and we will add it in the archive of the Public Library in a special section!

Earn Skill “Kamizu’s Blessing”: Indiegogo exclusive! This skill will let you know in advance 1 of the requirements needed in Quest Equip. You'll have only to ask to the Deity.

Create a Beast: Work with the team to create and design one monster

Create an Item or a Weapon: Work with the team to create and design an Item or a Weapon and earn it automatically as the game starts

Create a Location: Work with the team to create and design a Location and its function in the story.

Create a Character: Work with the team to create and design one Main Character that will be added to the story

Create a Skill: Work with the team to create and design a Skill and earn it automatically as the game starts.

Chat Vocale con Boris Malgor:  A vocal or written chat with Boris Malgor, one of the main influencing character in Dropp. During this conversation you will have the chance to ask Boris for important info about Dropp and its secrets. Probably Boris will have some precious and confidential information for you... 

 

 

Sons of Dropp is a universe characterized by amazing and engaging narrative, audio and visual contents.

The story proceeds through animations, illustrations, storytelling and many other assets that make the project unique.

So far, we have been financing the project through personal investment and a small grant by the Lazio Regional Council, which allowed us to cover some of the costs related to the collaborators, the creation of the main narrative structure, the design of the firsts concept arts and the prototyping of the website.

Thanks to that grant – which has been entirely used up – Sons of Dropp could still be launched and run, even we do not reach the target amount here, but it will have to be done with a quality and quantity of contents inferior to our goals.

To offer the experience that we have in mind, we need support of everyone and that is why your contribution here on Indiegogo is essential to us.

The Indiegogo campaign will entirely be dedicated to the development and the enrichment, in terms of quality and quantity, of the narrative, visual and audio contents that will define the gaming environment.

If we reach our funding objective we will be able to expand the frames of secondary storylines and side quests, realize higher-quality articulated animations, create concept arts for each situation and event we propose, enrich the whole project with details that will make it a captivating and engaging experience.

Sons of Dropp will be free, though we do not exclude a pay-to-play version that will guarantee the access to exclusive contents and to the making-of.

The city of Dropp needs you for its revival!

It also needs you to share the initiative and spread the word as much as you can.

So do not hesitate to subscribe to the channels of the project: once Sons of Dropp is launched, they will all form part of the SOD experience!

Facebook

Official FB Group

Twitter

Instagram

Telegram

Mailing List

RISKS AND CHALLANGE

The most risky task will be to keep the contents and the platforms together, in order to create the pulsating and vibrant world we have in mind.

Developing a story strongly defined by visual contents that allows user interaction and has within it role play elements, is expensive and complex. We need a clear and at the same time flexible programming, which allows us to shape the story also on the basis of user participation.

The obstacles during the development of the project will be linked to the structure we have in mind. This is why we are working to create a game system which is simple and intriguing at the same time.

For us, the challenge has already begun, so are you ready to become the Sons of Dropp?
story_txt:
Versione in Italiano (italian version): https://goo.gl/e4pqGc
Sons of Dropp is a new concept of interactive online story that merges the principles of Role Playing with those of transmedia narration.
A constantly evolving virtual world which can be explored by navigating freely on the official website and Social Network platforms connected to it.
Immerse yourself into the setting, interact in real time with characters, join quests, earn experience points and influence the storyline with your choices.
In Sons of Dropp the story is not yet defined and much of his course depends on you too.
Available late 2018
 

The story begins in the city of Dropp, cornerstone of a universe that freely mingles the Western and Fantasy genres, to create a Weird-West setting where classic 19th-century elements of the Old West blend with modern technology.
In the middle of a deserted wasteland, features of the past meet modernity in a mixture of sand, wood, electricity and machinery, providing a unique environment for the game.
The city is built online and set in specific Locations hosted on the Social Network platforms and on the Official Site. Each Location has its own function and dedicated contents, and is usually managed by a Main Character.
The world structure and narrative form are based on the principles of transmedia storytelling, where different media contribute to the development of the story, creating a richer and more engaging user experience.
To visit and interact with a specific Location, the user will simply have to go the platform hosting it:

The once flourishing city of Dropp now lies in ruins, after a terrible earthquake triggered a series of catastrophic events that put it down on its knees.
Only a few areas and buildings are left standing in the city, and that is where the user, who will in all respects become one of its citizens, will start living his own adventure, in a world in constant evolution!

EVery Location will have its function and content. here you could find Quest to join, main characters opinion about the story events and more detail about the narration. 
The Last Dropp Inn, where  you can drink the excellent Mesaz of the rough innkeeper Boris Malgor and the Street, guarded by the mysterious Stranger will be hosted respectively on Facebook and Twitter.

The Public Library, managed by the wise librarian Judith Sandoval and the Construction Yard, a symbol of rebirth, directed by the brilliant engineer Majr Zonza, can be visited on the official website of Sons of Dropp.


Also the Kamizu Shrine, where the deity Kamizu is worshipped, will be hosted on the official site.

Is very important to note that characters will be "run" by real people! So dialogues will be 100% spontaneous!
 


Narration and Interaction will be organized as follow:

The Main Story is narrated through Animated Episodes, that generate small "Narrative Arcs".
The length of each narrative arc will vary, but their average duration in the real world will be of about 1 month.
Within each narrative arc, a system of Quests, Missions and Random Events will help the users/citizens deepen their understanding of the narrative universe and interact with it through:
Quests linked to the primary storyline (and thus with the events narrated in the animated episodes);
Side Quests that can trigger smaller and secondary storylines;
Natural or Random Events that can affect the city and will require the participation of a number of citizens to be addressed;
Missions proposed by Characters.


Upon the completion of all Main Quests linked to an animated episode, the next episode will start, giving way to a new narrative arc that will allow the story to continue.


The virtual narrative world continues to exist and evolve, even when the users are not online, thanks to the authors running it behind the curtain.
Sons of Dropp is set up as a "persistent world", in which Time plays an innovative role: even if you decide to stay out of the action for a day, important events may still occur and you could be thrown into an ongoing cataclysm or an enemy invasion on your next visit.
If that happens, you can still catch up on the story by viewing the animated episodes, that will always be accessible, or by going through the Summary Section on the website.

In some cases, the behaviour of the community may influence and change the course of events. Secondary storylines can actually generate situations where the community inputs and decisions will determine the outcome of an issue.

In the image above:


A. Quest ask citizens to get rid of infected in a specific area in the city.

B. After this, a new Quest will begin, asking to remove corpses all around to avoid a new infection. In this case, a minimum number of users have to join and succeed the quest.

C. If the number of users IS NOT REACHED, the quest is failed and the infection starts again, even worst than before.

D. In the other case, the problem is solved and order restored. For the moment...


It is important to understand that this is not a videogame you’ll be looking at, nor an online game or a browser game. It is a new and different experience that has, as we have said, a compelling story.
The user interface on the site will therefore be reduced to a minimum, to give us the opportunity to elastically manage and elaborate the story and the events narrated, ensuring a varied and engaging interaction.
The official website will perform the following important functions:​
- It will be a connection to the whole narrative universe. In the homepage there will be a map that will indicate which locations are reachable in the present moment. A section that will summarize all the narrative events will also be available.

- It will manage the points and equipment system. In the profile created on the site will be collected all information about the "status" of the citizen: experience points acquired, equipment unlocked, current level.

- It will host some locations. In the Public Library section, for example, you can access archive of the city (Game Bible) where you will find all the information on the elements that make up the narrative universe, or you can find out if the librarian has some Quests to propose.


The Quests and Missions System represents the way in which citizens will be called to action.
The setting will be as follows:

The types of Quest will be different:
CREATIVE QUESTS: they present an opening narration and ask the citizen to write his actions describing how he would deal with the proposed situation. The more creative and consistent with the opening narration the descriptions will be, the more chance you have to beat the Quest.

EQUIPMENT QUESTS: in the next paragraph we will explain how it will be possible to unlock equipment that will allow the citizen to participate in this type of Quest.

It foresees initially hidden equipment.
The colors of the equipment icons indicate the type of equipment required.
The citizen must choose between the equipment he has already unlocked, commenting on the Quest with the elements he considers necessary to deal with the situation.
It is mandatory to comment with a number of items equal to the number of the hidden ones.
When the Quest concludes, the requirements are published and the citizens who have guessed them pass the Quest.

Quest at its launch:
Quest resolved:

Note: The opening narration of the Quest provides valuable information about the necessary equipment.
If the description suggests, for example, to act in silence, there is a good chance that the required weapon is not a firearm but a silent weapon!
MULTIPLE ANSWER QUESTS: data una situazione bisognerà scegliere l'azione reputata più giusta tra quelle proposte  
OTHER TYPOLOGIES which we will reveal further ahead​
Not all the Quests will be available by browsing the site only. It may happen that they are issued in one of the locations hosted by social networks, which is why we recommend exploring the entire "universe".

 

Participating in the Quests guarantees the acquisition of:

Experience Points
Currency Points

EXPERIENCE POINTS can be earned:

Succeeding in the Quests
Participating in the proposed activities (eg surveys)
Visualizing, sharing and commenting on content (video and news)
Inviting friends to sign on
Visiting the site daily
...and more!

and will allow:

To Advance a Level
To Unlock Weapons, Items and Skills
Rise up in the community rankings to get access to the Duel of the Month and win real prizes!

 
CURRENCY POINTS can be used to:

Unlock discount coupons for the official Store
Contribute to the construction of new locations (thus expanding the setting and the characteristics of the narrative universe)
Access exclusive content


 
Weapons, Items and Skills are the elements to be used in the Equipment Quests and can be obtained in different ways:

By moving up a Level
Purchasing them at the city emporium
As a reward for succeeding in a quest


 

Every month the first 3 citizens in the ranking will participate in the Duel of the Month, ie in a specific quest for this circumstance. The winner will be rewarded with a digital or real prize and his name will be engraved forever in the Dropp Hall of Fame!

 
 
Sons of Dropp is an experience to be enjoyed following the pulse of its citizenship, stopping by every day in different locations, discovering what is new in town and participating in the events.
The play time is totally up to the users and should be regular; it is impossible to define it as "gaming sessions".
The days in Dropp will run in parallel to the real-world days and it will be up to the citizens to decide when, how and how much they want to participate in the adventure in order to feel satisfied, knowing that the main story will still be following the natural course of events.
 



NOTE: Perk starting from VIP CITIZEN on include "Chronicles of Dropp volume", that will be ready in the first half of 2019. For these perks, we can ship a digital version of every other object in October 2018, and then ship every physical object when the volume will be ready.
Perk description: 
Citizenship Certificate: ​A testimonial to your citizenship, something to be proud of! Printed in A4 from authorities of Dropp, numbered and with your name
Tourist Guide: All you need to know to organize in the best way your trip to the most charming and dangerous city on the planet Hyle is here ...  Contains story, attractives and pastimes in Dropp. It also includes hints on how to enjoy Sons of Dropp at its best! Are you ready to go?
Passport: The official ID document of every citizen. It contains a complete list of all unlockables objects in the game, and is a great way to mark your unlocked equipment. Keep track of your progress here and always bring it with you to choose equip for quests in a faster and cooler way! Is a small format booklet and will fit your pockets!
Create a secondary storyline: Work with the team and contribute in creating a secondary storyline and its quests.
Libro "Le Cronache di Dropp": A volume which gather all the events that will be narrated in the launching season of Sons of Dropp, in novel form. Best actions user will perform during the adventure will be included too, and you could have the chance to read about your epic  exploits! (also digital).
Hardcover Artbook: A collection of concept art and artworks which gave life to this project
Your Bio in the Public Library: create your own bio and we will add it in the archive of the Public Library in a special section!
Earn Skill “Kamizu’s Blessing”: Indiegogo exclusive! This skill will let you know in advance 1 of the requirements needed in Quest Equip. You'll have only to ask to the Deity.
Create a Beast: Work with the team to create and design one monster
Create an Item or a Weapon: Work with the team to create and design an Item or a Weapon and earn it automatically as the game starts
Create a Location: Work with the team to create and design a Location and its function in the story.
Create a Character: Work with the team to create and design one Main Character that will be added to the story
Create a Skill: Work with the team to create and design a Skill and earn it automatically as the game starts.
Chat Vocale con Boris Malgor:  A vocal or written chat with Boris Malgor, one of the main influencing character in Dropp. During this conversation you will have the chance to ask Boris for important info about Dropp and its secrets. Probably Boris will have some precious and confidential information for you... 
 

 

Sons of Dropp is a universe characterized by amazing and engaging narrative, audio and visual contents.
The story proceeds through animations, illustrations, storytelling and many other assets that make the project unique.
So far, we have been financing the project through personal investment and a small grant by the Lazio Regional Council, which allowed us to cover some of the costs related to the collaborators, the creation of the main narrative structure, the design of the firsts concept arts and the prototyping of the website.
Thanks to that grant – which has been entirely used up – Sons of Dropp could still be launched and run, even we do not reach the target amount here, but it will have to be done with a quality and quantity of contents inferior to our goals.
To offer the experience that we have in mind, we need support of everyone and that is why your contribution here on Indiegogo is essential to us.
The Indiegogo campaign will entirely be dedicated to the development and the enrichment, in terms of quality and quantity, of the narrative, visual and audio contents that will define the gaming environment.
If we reach our funding objective we will be able to expand the frames of secondary storylines and side quests, realize higher-quality articulated animations, create concept arts for each situation and event we propose, enrich the whole project with details that will make it a captivating and engaging experience.
Sons of Dropp will be free, though we do not exclude a pay-to-play version that will guarantee the access to exclusive contents and to the making-of.
The city of Dropp needs you for its revival!
It also needs you to share the initiative and spread the word as much as you can.
So do not hesitate to subscribe to the channels of the project: once Sons of Dropp is launched, they will all form part of the SOD experience!
